title: Best Condo's on Fort Myers Beach
review: We have been spending our vacations at Pointe Estero Resort for many years and usually spend most of November there. The condo's are very spacious and well appointed,  the facilities provided are excellent and the property is constantly being improved. The spacious pool area, grill area and gardens are maintained to a high standard. The views from a High Floor Beach Front unit are the best on FMB. All of the staff are friendly, helpful and eager to please. We will hopefully spend many more vacations here.

title: Excellent place to stay on Fort Myers Beach
review: We had a fantastic trip to Ft. Myers Beach. Pointe Estero was a fabulous place to stay. We normally stay at the Gullwing but now have a new favorite. Will definately be  returning soon to Pointe Estero.

title: What a find!
review: We did a google search for a last minute hotel stay on the beach and Pointe Estero did not disappoint!  Enormous room and very nice amenities.  Staff was very friendly and accomodating.  We WILL be return guests!

title: The Perfect Retreat
review: Pointe Estero Beach Resort is the perfect place for a beach get away. Located in Fort Myers, FL it is close to "beach" things to do, but is the most amazing spot for shelling and just sitting on the beach & relaxing!!! The staff is super friendly!

title: Another amazing visit to this fantastic resort
review: Hello LWBeach2015- Thank you for taking the time to share your review, we love to hear from our guests! We are pleased that our service is one of the attributes that you enjoy in addition to the gorgeous beach. We are pleased that we can provide a pleasant vacation place and hope to have you back again! Best Regards, Brian Schomacker – General Manager

title: Great time on Ft Myers Beach
review: As always, Pointe Estero Beach Resort was beautiful and a great place to stay.  The rooms/condos are large and well cared for.  We had a wonderful time!  Many restaurants and bars within walking distance and a tiki bar just north and south of the property!

title: Amazing resort
review: Hello PennyS87- We are so glad that you enjoy coming to Pointe Estero and find it a great place to stay on Fort Myers Beach. We are grateful for your feedback, thank you for taking the time to post a review. It is always a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Brian Schomacker – General Manager

title: Love it!
review: We were very pleasantly surprised with the cleanliness and location of this resort. We booked online and you never know what you are truly getting. All of the condos are 2 BR 2 Bath suites with full kitchens. You don’t need to bring anything! We had a beachfront condo and the view was breathtaking. It’s super quiet there too. They have plenty of parking up front. No issues at this resort at all. Front desk staff was super friendly as well. Definitely recommend and we will return here!

title: Another Joyous Getaway at Pointe Estero Beach Resort
review: Hello Andrea- We are pleased to hear that you had such a nice experience at Pointe Estero. We are glad that the accommodations and amenities were pleasing. Thank you for sharing your review, your recommendation is very kind. We enjoyed the opportunity to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Brian Schomacker – General Manager

title: Amazing place to stay
review: This place is perfect for a girls trip or any getaway. Trolley stop can take you to town, great places to eat within walking distance. Shopping and cabaña rentals too. You can paddle board or rent a jet ski but... You may never want to leave the suite. Its so beautiful.. Pay the extra for beach view,!!!

title: Long Weekend Getaway
review: This is not a hotel but more like condos for rent. There is a front desk. In the room, one bathroom has a washer/dryer, the kitchen is stocked with essentials, bathrooms have towels and beach towels. They do not exchange bathroom towels, you are responsible for washing the ones you have. They do not have a convenience store onsite but there is a nice grocery store about one mile away. We had a two-bedroom condo that was quite comfortable in size with a nice screened balcony and a view of the gulf.  There is also a patio onsite with bbq grills for your use. The beach was very clean and large, but umbrellas and chairs are not provided by the hotel.  It’s not the cleanest place and we had several issues that they need to address including slow draining tubs and a moldy dishwasher…

title: Enjoyable
review: Hello dickota- We are glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay and enjoyed the accommodations and amenities. We regret that the cleanliness of your room was not satisfactory and sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our team is committed to continually improving and guest feedback keeps us accountable. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest. Sincerely, Brian Schomacker – General Manager

title: Perfect Beach Front Resort
review: My Kind of place with Tropical Vibe, Day tripped to Captiva, awesome Sunsets, Road construction towards Fort Meyers Beach right now a little annoying, Publix nearby +++, Nice Pool and BBQ area, Enjoyed my stay and considered it a value.

title: Great Price Find
review: Hi Departure403482- We are thrilled to hear that your visit to Pointe Estero was an enjoyable experience and a great value. We apologize for the road construction and any inconvenience it caused. They tell us that once it is complete, traffic will be smooth sailing. Your feedback is appreciated and we were glad to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Brian Schomacker – General Manager

title: Girls trip
review: We stayed in a beautiful oceanfront suite.  The suite was bright, clean, spacious and well equipped.  The swimming pool and jacuzzi was lovely.  There is a Publix 5 mins away so we picked up some food and had a lovely dinner on our balcony watching the sunset.  The staff were friendly and helpful.  We only stayed 1 night but we plan on returning for a much longer stay on our next trip to Florida.  We would definitely recommend.

title: Relaxing weekend
review: Our group of 4 enjoyed a very relaxing weekend at the resort.  All the staff we interacted with were friendly and responsive.  Room and common areas were clean and attractive.  My family last visited 20 years ago and the property still in great shape and in a good location on Ft Myers Beach.  Hope to visit again.

title: Nice vacation in Ft. Myers
review: Hi 38DMF- Thank you for returning to Pointe Estero. We are pleased to hear that it was just as pleasing as the last time you were here. We are glad that your group enjoyed a relaxing weekend on the beach and found our staff to be friendly and responsive. It was a pleasure to have you back and we are grateful for your review. Sincerely, Brian Schomacker – General Manager

title: Was Maybe Great in its HeyDays (30 years ago...)
review: Very good location and very quiet. We were very well filled. It's a good point to discover Fort Myers.We only at 23:00 in the hotel and on our call at the entrance long no one answered. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We will definitely book again at Pointe Estero.

title: Great Place!
review: Hi Scenic230010- Thank you for staying at Pointe Estero. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the resort and would definitely stay here again in the future. We apologize that your call was not answered promptly and I will be sure to followup with our staff in regards to this. We are grateful for your feedback and appreciate your review. Sincerely, Brian Schomacker – General Manager

title: Great place!
review: We booked the property after speaking with someone at length over the phone... expecting it to be a great stay! No vacation accommodations should be poorer than your own home. We were told one of the better resorts in the area and recently renovated! But not sure what other than living room and dining room furniture. You can see the renovated areas on resort website!  Wall to wall mirror so we couldnt sit down without staring at outselves. We stayed in a 2-bedroom suite and the beds were OK. The kitchen was dated from the 70s with old and worn fridge, stove and dishwasher! (see photos)  The bathrooms were remodeled however, smell of urine was in all the bathrooms! The plastic window curtains were worn with holes in them so that the sun would strain in at dawn! (see photos). We…

title: Great gate away vacation
review: Great place to relax and enjoy the sun and gulf of mexico with the family!!!  Condominium was great too.   Pool, Jacuzzi, beautiful property.  Very nice beach with basketball net.  Jet-ski, umbrellas and lunge chairs and beds available for purchase.

title: Excellent Apartment in a really nice area
review: Hello desna78- We are pleased to hear that Pointe Estero was the great place to relax and enjoy time with your family! We are glad that we could offer the accommodations and amenities to compliment your time together. It was a pleasure to have you all as our guest and we appreciate your review! Sincerely, Brian Schomacker – General Manager

title: Perfect beach resort!
review: Location and apartment are perfect for a calm and relaxing stay. Very clean rooms and beautiful neighborhood. Long beach for nice walks with little restaurants and shops around the corner. Supermarket just 5min by car.

title: Disappointed
review: Hello jhL8873QC- Thank you for visiting Pointe Estero, We are so glad you enjoyed the accommodations, location and beach. We love to hear from our guests and we appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Brian Schomacker – General Manager

title: A Little Piece of Heaven
review: We stay at the resort 1-2 times a year and were pleasantly  surprised at all the updates they have made to the rooms since we were there last November . We love the pool for the kids and the beach there is perfect. Chairs and umbrellas available for rent so we don’t have to lug everything to the beach is perfect for our large family !

title: Horrible
review: We stayed in the penthouse, and paid $4,000 for one week's stay.  The first night the elevator broke and only one was running for all 16 floors.  There is no air conditioning in any of the hallways, elevator, or stairway. These areas are completely closed in with walls and windows vases being open for air flow.  Terrible design especially when we had to walk up 16 flights of stairs.  The appliances were rusted and banged up in the kitchen, the tile floors were chipped, we had yellow candy wrappers everywhere, our windows leaked the entire time, there were children's fingerprints all over the sliding doors , glass tables, and mirrors.  We had to pull out the furniture to put towels everywhere to catch the water running in.  When we pulled the furniture forward  there was absolute…

title: Great place to stay in Ft Myers.
review: Hello hhdsofbr2019- We sincerely apologize for the disappointing experience you had while visiting Pointe Estero. We apologize that the elevator was out of service and the inconvenience that resulted. As far as the cleanliness of your room goes, this is unacceptable. I hope that our staff was able to resolve this issue immediately after you notified them. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are continually trying to improve our service and facilities and this is very helpful. Sincerely, Brian Schomacker – General Manager

title: July 4 weekend and beyond.
review: This was a group booking for a baseball tournament and the location to the beach and other places was great! Felt like home with the spacious rooms and had everything we needed while in the city. I recommend this property whether for family or just a get away.

title: Nice rooms, very clean
review: Hello Greg- It was a pleasure to have you all here as our guest, we are glad your group enjoyed the accommodations and location. We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review. Thank you for choosing Pointe Estero! Best Regards, Brian Schomacker – General Manager

title: Family  Vacation
review: The view of the beach from our room was breath taking. The rooms were large and the three of us never felt crowded. Everything was clean and neat. There was an abundance of towels and soaps. The staff was nice and helpful. The pool was clean and so was the surrounding area. One concern was when one of the two elevators was out of order but it was never out for too long. We never had to wait too long for one. We will definitely be coming back next year.

title: Awesome vacation!
review: Great resort, beautiful beach! Location of resort was perfect for us. Visited Bonita Springs several times, nice drive to Sanibel Island. Extremely nice room and experience with staff. Will definitely visit again!

title: great place to enjoy beach with family
review: Hello Seaside30903908211- We are delighted to hear that you had such a nice visit! We are glad you enjoyed the accommodations and the service was extremely nice. Your feedback is important to us and we appreciate you taking the time to share you review. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Good times
review: Pointe Estero Beach Resort is perfectly located at the beautiful beach of Fort Myers Beach, and offers a big pool as well as very comfortable apartments (with everything included, such as furnished kitchen, large balcony with mosquito screens).

title: Wonderful Resort
review: Hello Birgit1311- Thank you for visiting Pointe Estero. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the accommodations and amenities at the resort. We appreciate your feedback and are grateful for your review. Best Regards, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Excellent - absolutely gorgeous!
review: Nice beach, nice pool, nice staff, nice room with panoramic views (2-bedroom beachfront).  Only negative is that it is far from the pier where there are more shops, restaurants, activities ($20 Uber)..

title: Best hotel period!!
review: Everything in this hotel was amazing!! The only thing that would make it better would be food options, so that we wouldn’t have to drive so far. The rooms are wonderful and next time I would like to stay in the two bedroom beachfront.

title: Great vacation spot
review: Hello Alberto S-   We are delighted to hear that you found everything in the hotel to be amazing! Please know that we appreciate your feedback regarding food options, we will certainly share your review with our team as we continually look for areas in which to improve. Thank you for staying at Pointe Estero!   Sincerely,  Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Wonderful Girls Weekend Trip!
review: Great spot, clean, nice pool, great beach access and professional personnel. Nice restaurants close by, and short detour Sanibel, Bonita Beach, etc. Lots of activities for all ages. Next time would like to take boat trips to other islands.

title: Great Stay!
review: Hello kerlinj2018-   Thank you for staying with us! We are so happy to hear that you found Pointe Estero to be a great spot! It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we look forward to seeing you again next time!   Sincerely,  Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Wouldn’t stay anywhere else!!
review: This is an excellent property. From Jessica and Kristin in group reservations to the front desk staff, I must say that all were extremely helpful and wanted to ensure that our stay was a pleasant one...The grounds were well kept, the rooms were immaculate, and the views were breath-taking!

title: Relaxing family getaway
review: This is more of a condo rental rather than a hotel or resort.The check in process was smooth and easy. We were given a partial ocean view room on the 7th floor and the view of the ocean was fine but partially obstructed. We would have preferred a higher floor as requested in our reservation but it appeared that our room was preassigned and ready. The two bedroom suite was spacious, clean and well appointed. They recently upgraded furniture so it has a more modern day look.  We enjoyed several meals in the unit and on the balcony using the many kitchen supplies. It is an additional $15 a day for basic housekeeping, otherwise you do your own laundry and take out your own trash. Each unit is given a prescribed number of beach towels that you have to continually switch out at the…

title: Mini break
review: Hello MK162-   Thank you for staying at Pointe Estero. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and truly appreciate your thorough review of the resort. Please know that your feedback is important to us and will be given to our team for review as we continually look for areas to improve. It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we hope to see you again in the future.   Kind Regards,  Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: My favorite place to be!
review: Excellent accommodation.  Room on 15th floor.  Views spectacular.   Lovely sunrise and sunset views. Very friendly and helpful staff.  Coffee available every morning in lobby..  Loved being able to walk out of grounds straight on to gorgeous beach.

title: Girls trip 2019
review: Hello Sue Y- Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. We are glad you enjoyed the spacious room and spectacular views. We are fortunate to be located on such a beautiful stretch of beach. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Best Regards, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Great customer service, tired facility
review: This was our fourth trip to Pointe Estero and we always enjoy everything about it. The South FMB location, the proximity to activities, the beautiful grounds, the low-key family vibe, the pool, the beach, the included bikes, the size, the all- condo units that all have a great view down to the awesome staff...I could go on-but overall it is truly my happy place for a relaxing, laid back family vacation! We will be back!

title: Condo style resort hotel, no maid service, but large 2 bedroom condo.  Right on the OCEAN.
review: Sometimes condos offer maid service, this did not. but we did have a washer and dryer in our unit as well as full kitchen and appliances.  The 2nd bedroom bath was tiny, very narrow, but our master bath was huge with huge walk in shower (and rain head).   Very quiet in our unit, it was spring break time, and we could hardly tell anyone else was at the resort when inside our unit.  No restaurant on site is a huge drawback.  Especially if its late and you want a quick bite.  Nice balcony area,  with views to the ocean.  Pool was overcrowded with families and kids during the day.  We mostly used the beach instead.    Condo is directly on the ocean and sandy beach.  That made our stay!!!

title: Great amenities but needs an update
review: Hello Lisa_0123210- Thank you for choosing Pointe Estero, we are pleased to hear that you had a nice stay. We apologize that we do not offer any on site dining and hope that you enjoyed one of the nearby restaurants. Your feedback is important to us and we appreciate you taking the time to share your review. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest. Best Regards, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: elevators
review: Great location if you're not into the party scene at the pier. Close enough to visit the pier but not in the chaos and traffic of the pier. The room was stale and needed updating. I felt it could have been cleaner. There was dust and grime hanging from the vents. The room smelled old.  The amenities were great! Never had to buy extra paper goods as needed with some condo rentals. They even supplied the Tide and Snuggle for the washer and dryer. Always felt safe and parking was never a problem. We had a Gulf view room and literally had a Gulf view from every room in the unit. Loved the big balcony looking over the beach. I would stay here again, but it does need to be cleaner. The king bed wasn't very comfortable but I know that is always personal preference. The pillows are…

title: Third time
review: Hello izandjoeysmom- Thank you for visiting Pointe Estero, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest! We are in the process of updating all rooms at the resort and anticipate finishing this spring. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the amenities and Gulf view. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We hope to have you back again in the future! Best Regards, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Pointe Estero, Fort Myers Beach, Florida
review: Make sure the elevators (both) are working if not you will end up stuck on your floor for 30 min or longer just to get down  to the lobby.  Was a great place to stay.   will be happy to see how it looks when the upgrades are finished just hope the elevators are the first things.  Would be helpful if more info was in the room as far a places to dine especially delivery options.

title: Family vacation
review: Rooms were great. Loved the layout and space. We had an oceanfront room.the view was a panoramic view that did not disappoint.   The free bikes were a nice perk. We biked down to time square twice with our 10 and 12 year old kids. About a 30 minute ride.   We will be back 😀

title: Pointe Estero - Beautiful Property!!
review: Hello Escape590323- Thank you for visiting Pointe Estero, we are glad that your accommodations were pleasing. Getting out on the bikes is a great way to experience the beach and we're glad you enjoyed it with your family. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, thank you for posting a review! Best Regards, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Last Minute Surprise
review: Amazing property with great rooms and amenities.  Right on the beach.  Can rent a beach chair with umbrella by the day or week.  The pool and barbecue area is also wonderful, kids loved it! They have a quiet well maintained property and the staff is always there with a smile and help if you need it!

title: Great location
review: Hello mariaaanenson- We are delighted that you enjoyed the property and your family had a great time while visiting. We have a tremendous staff and we are glad that they added to your enjoyment of the resort. We appreciate your review! Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: okay spot...not worth price
review: Because the weather is so nasty back home, we took a chance & booked here for 2 days before going back north. We were so pleased with the accommodations, (& there was availability) so we booked another 2 days!

title: The Perfect Family Hotel
review: This hotel/condo is a perfect spot for families. On the most beautiful beach imaginable and a well designed pool with a barbeque area and a rentable gazebo. The rooms on our floor (7) seemed perfect for families -- loved the wrap around lanai and very functional kitchen. Wouldn't have wanted the lower rooms because of the big air conditioning external fans -- would suggest floors 4+.

title: Family friendly, total excellence
review: Hi maryettec- We are pleased that you found Pointe Estero to be perfect for families. We strive to be a great vacation destination and are glad that you enjoyed the accommodations. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and post a review. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest! Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Great week
review: Exceeded our expectations in every area. Pool and beach were lovely. Room was perfect. Beds very comfortable. Could not hear neighboring guests even though properly was completely full. Enclosed wrap around lanai was perfect for kids and adults. We cannot wait to return and would recommend to anyone.

title: Rooms are getting dated
review: Hello Kelly- We are thrilled to hear that Pointe Estero exceeded your expectations. We are glad that the accommodations and amenities were so pleasing. Thank you for taking the time to share your review, we really appreciate the recommendation. It was a pleasure to have you and we look forward to your return! Best Regards, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Year after Year
review: Enjoyed a week in the condo that was very nice. Oceanside views were wonderful for sunsets! Condo was comfortable and well maintained.  It was in process of replacing and updating all furnishings. All that remained was to replace the living room furniture. Would return again.

title: Hotel was great
review: The hotel is on the ocean. The front guy who checked us in named Tyler was very nice and answered all our questions. He turned us onto a great place to eat down the road .  Our room was clean and we said we will be coming back next year!

title: Gulf view
review: Hello FLA4204- Thank you for choosing Pointe Estero, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest. We are pleased that you enjoyed Pointe Estero and found our staff to be welcoming and helpful. We look forward to your return visit next year! Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Not the Quiet Place it Seams
review: I went to Fort Meyers for my 61 birthday. I wanted to stay at a beach resort with a view of the beach. I booked this trip through the Allegiant website. When I looked at pictures on the resort website it looked like the ‘gulf view’ was a full view of the beach. This is not true. The first picture is directly from the resort website of the advertised ‘gulf view’. The 2nd is my actual view from the bedroom. Not quite the same. That being said, the room was spacious and very clean. The property was well maintained and I did enjoy my trip. As I said I’m 61 and I should have called the resort directly to make sure the room has a direct view of the beach. I would still recommend this resort. My room was awesome. Just beware that the gulf view rooms may vary from those pictured on…

title: Family vacation
review: Hi Enygma7- Thank you for taking the time to review Pointe Estero. Unfortunately, we are unable to see the pictures you referenced. We will be sure to verify that the Allegiant website and our own website are accurately representing the view from each room. We appreciate you sharing this and apologize for the inconvenience. We are pleased that you had an enjoyable trip and we are thankful for your recommendation! Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Summer vacation
review: I like staying in a  property off the " PARTY SECTION " of the beach . So checked into this more residential condo. At first seamed very nice and cozy, then first night men drinking an screaming obscenities outside downstairs by the pool and off neighboring balcony. Second night the same . Saturday morning told manager and he advised to call Security that night if it happened again. (Where was this security on the first two nights when I could hear this 6 floors in the air. on the Saturday they have one day guest , at least 10 to one room by lunch they had taken over the pool area and playing loud music and partying . I asked the manger about it and he sent security to check they had a room. and they only got louder. I asked security to have them turn the music down and he went…

title: 3 time visiting in 6 years.
review: We have visited Pointe Estero Resort 3 times the last 6 years. ( we travel from Norway ) we have stayed there for 2 weeks every time. We love the Place. This year we had bad Luck during red tide. So we couldent visit the Beach as much as be had hoped, but luckely PE have a pool. There are free Beach towels and it is clean and Nice. There are Nice resturants near buy. Publix is a 7 min drive away and you hae both a Beach Movie and CVS in walking distance.

title: Clean and comfortable
review: Hello C7320TTmonicab- Thank you for repeatedly choosing to spend your vacations with us, it is always a pleasure to have you as our guests! We apologize for any inconvenience the red tide may have caused you and your family. It is rare for our beaches to be affected like this. We appreciate your understanding and look forward to your next visit! Best Regards, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Great Location
review: We stayed here again this spring and once again found our room both clean and comfortable.  We have stayed here many times in the past and have not been disappointed.  The property in general is very well maintained, and the hotel staff has always been friendly and helpful.  The rooms do need a bit of updating because it seems as if nothing has ever been changed(except for the bathrooms)in all the years we’ve been going there, but they are certainly taken care of and very clean.  The beach is very wide at this point but also well taken care of.

title: Desperately needs renovation!
review: Hi Steve- Thank you for repeatedly spending your vacations with us. It is a pleasure to have you as our guest and we pleased that you enjoy the resort. We have some exciting updates planned for the suites and I think you will really like the new look. We hope to begin this towards the end of the year. Thank you for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor, we really appreciate it! Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Perfect for our group!
review: This was my second time staying here and I would recommend.  The front desk staff were very welcoming and helpful and I had a great apartment which looked like it had been recently updated.  The pool area was nice and it is on the beach.

title: Excellent!
review: Room was spacious and had everything we needed. Front desk was helpful and accommodating. The pool area was nice, but smaller than I expected. Walk to the beach was a long one, but so quiet.  I can see myself staying here time and time again.

title: Great place to stay in Ft. Myers
review: Hi MelissaSunny78- We are thrilled that you enjoyed the resort and found everything you needed. We are on the widest stretch of beach on Fort Myers Beach so it can be a little bit of a hike to get to the water. We would love to have you back again! Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Good Times at Pointe Estero!
review: We’ve stayed at Pointe Estero in Ft. Myers a couple times so far, we like this area of Florida.  It’s close to Sanibel and other areas on the West Coast so the location is great.  The hotel is right on the beach and provides good views even from the 2nd floor where we stayed during our last trip.  The layouts are nice and spacious and the units are “clean”.  The only ding I can give it is that the places are a bit dated, coffee pots instead of Keurig’s and furniture etc., but I didn’t really care, like I said the places are clean. Everything works, AC in the rooms was perfect, and 2 baths so which is awesome.  There are plenty of restaurants around and many deliver.  The pool was always spotless and we met a ton of great people out there on days we didn’t go to the beach.   One…

title: Located on a beautiful beach.
review: Hi craziebones6- We are so happy that you chose to spend another vacation at Pointe Estero. Your loyalty really means a lot to us. I am so pleased that Ira was able to locate your device and get it back to you promptly. Thank you for sharing your review, it was a pleasure having you back! Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Don’t come for the beach
review: We started out the week with a beautiful engagement party for our daughter and fiancé, complements of my sister and brother-in-law. We spent quality time with my niece her husband and her three daughters. Despite the tropical wave we had a great time, mornings were beautiful and then the rain came. We also enjoyed our lunches at Pinchers on the Beach...The photo of the heron is one of the locals, Henry! We’ve been coming to this resort for 20 years, the only recommendation I would make is that it is time for new furniture, the rooms need an update. Thank you for a wonderful beach vacation even though I live across the river in Cape Coral! 😎

title: Annual Family Vacation
review: We have been coming to Pointe Estero for years.  The location is ideal - directly on the beach, short walk to CVS, Santini Plaza and trolley stop.  Pool area is spacious. Bicycles are available for use.   Resort staff is friendly and accommodating.  Luis, at the front desk, couldn’t have been more helpful.  Whether it was a recommendation for pizza delivery or a question regarding resort amenities, he did his best to make sure we had an enjoyable stay.  I have to agree with other reviewers, the furniture is worn/dated. Internet was intermittent which was a little frustrating.   Manager responses to other reviews suggest updates are in the works.  I hope this is true!

title: Family Beach Getaway
review: Hi Bay16- It was a pleasure to have you back again and we are happy that you have consistently enjoyed Pointe Estero. I will be sure to pass along your compliments to Luis. Each year, we budget for resort improvements and renovations. New furnishings are on the list and we will be updating them as soon as we can. We appreciate you taking the time to share your review and hope to see you again soon! Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: No surprises ..Always Good
review: Pros: easy beach access, beautiful pool, walking distance to restaurants/stores, exterior was well kept. Cons: noisy spring breakers present at the bldg to the north of Pointe Estero, dated furniture Hotel is showing some wear and tear but I would stay here again. Next time I will request a front/ direct beach view room to try to minimize the potential noise coming from the neighbors to the N. Was never and issue w the bldg to the S.

title: First FMB trip
review: Hi lambertbunch- We are pleased that you enjoyed the resort and its location. We would be happy to accommodate any room requests you have in the future. Noise issues are very uncommon and we are sorry if any neighbors disrupted your experience. Thank you for choosing Pointe Estero and we hope you'll return soon! Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Beach break from New England Winter
review: Just returned from our 5th visit to Pointe Estero...The Resort has come through the recent Hurricane with a few bumps and bruises but still shows well as it sits in a gorgeous part of Ft. Myers Beach...The maintenance and housekeeping staff are always happy to help and the front desk staff  takes your concerns in stride...Lou is a nice addition to the Front Desk and as always Oleg is a great go to guy for any problems that creep up...T.V. s and Internet are expected to be upgraded in the near future which will help the Pointe Estero experience...If I was to pick one thing that needs to be addressed it would be the couch in the main room...its definitely past its shelf life.....Looking forward to next year for our 6th visit....

title: Pointe Estero
review: Overall nice resort, slightly outdated but still nice. Kids enjoyed pool area. Easy access to beach area where chair rentals are available. No reasturants but a short walk on the beach to one next door

title: Great Spot For Family Fun
review: Dear Dave,  Thank you for staying at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. We’re happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Please know that we are continuously improving our facilities and are currently in the process of replacing the carpeting in our units and have plans to upgrade the living rooms, dining rooms, and loft areas in the future. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have you as our guest again soon.  Sincerley, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Enjoyable Stay
review: This is our second time staying here. The first time we were on the north side 2 bed/2bath and while it was nice, this time our 2 bed/2bath Gulf View unit on the south side on the 11th floor was amazing. We enjoyed our coffee every morning on the lanai as we watched the sun rise and had dinner every evening watching the sun set. Our unit was perfect for 4 adults and a toddler with lots of room, comfy beds, a well appointed kitchen and a washer and dryer so we didn't have to pack so many clothes. We were within walking distance to Publix, CVS and Santini Plaza with the trolley stop right out in front.  The tennis court was quite nice. We rode the bikes provided for free to guests to Times Square and to Lovers Key. Really enjoyed the south side of the island away from the traffic…

title: Too many little problems
review: Point Estero made our FL stay an enjoyable one. Our family of four (2 adults, 2 teens) stayed in a two bedroom beach front room.  The room made our visit during the cold snap very comfortable.  Our unit was adequately stocked with plates, drink ware and flatware for eight.  There were pots, pans, baking dishes, coffee maker, toaster, paper towel, salt, pepper, laundry detergent, dishwasher detergent, coffee with filter bag, and beach towels.   The two screened in balconies with huge sliding doors were nice to gaze out over the ocean and to watch the sunsets.  The unit was older, but had updated bathrooms and kitchen counters.  It was nice to have a full kitchen to prepare breakfast and store snacks. The furniture is in need of replacement, but sufficed.  I would give the beds an…

title: Very Old and Dated
review: The good points:    Great location with plenty of dining options nearby.    Nice beach.    Friendly desk staff.    Ample parking.   The not so good points:  Noise. Sitting on the beautiful screened balcony on the 12th floor hoping to watch a sunset and as it is every night, the hot tub pump is screaming it’s high-pitched whistle from down below. Excruciating.   More Noise. The first two nights we suffered through a loose air extractor on the roof. Talked to others who had complained and gotten moved to a new room. It seems to have been fixed.  Spartan: hardly a thing in the kitchen. No spices, no sponge, no scouring pads. Decent coffee maker but no filters. Cheap? Yes.   Speaking of cheap, —low-def televisions and no radio? And WiFi that dropped out continuously and was slower…

title: Beautiful place, awesome beach, expensive!
review: We stayed at Pointe Estero Resort (unit #1004- gulf view) for a week over Thanksgiving.  Our last visit here was 20 years ago, in the same resort, but different unit.  It's a great place, but needs some upgrading for the price.  Unit 1004 is lovely and spacious with an outstanding set of balconies!   There is a vague scent of mold in the guest bathroom and could use new bedding in the master suite.  Kitchen is OK, all appliances worked, but cabinets needed a good cleaning. Big picture...we enjoyed our stay and would stay here again if the price was a bit more reasonable.

title: Disappointed
review: Dear Foodie774,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you decided to join us for a second visit! Please know that we are continuously improving our facilities and are currently in the process of replacing the carpeting in our units and have plans to upgrade the living rooms, dining rooms, and loft areas in the future. We appreciate your feedback and will certainly use your experience to focus on areas in which we may improve and continue our efforts to provide the best service possible.   Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Wonderful Getaway
review: Have stayed next door in Gullwing, thought I'd try something new. Mistake! Main complaint is cleanliness. Dust was everywhere and I can't even speak of what the underside of the toilet rims looks like. Mirrors are dirty, lots of dirt in spaces between things e.g. frig and countertops. Sheets felt grimy, as did the carpet. And of course, there was a roach or palmetto incident in the kitchen, wasn't surprised, actually surprised we only saw one.   Furnishings are beat up, cupboards are way overdue for replacement. Surprised there is no housekeeping service unless you pay extra or stay long. Expected same as next door as owned by same company.  Will go back to Gullwing or somewhere else, not Pointe Estero. Louis at front desk was helpful, offered to move us (but unit wasn't any…

title: Great room,huge beach, and friendly staff!
review: Dear TANNK2013,  Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns. We are disappointed to hear of your dissatisfaction during your recent stay. Our property team members are dedicated to doing whatever they can to improve your experience and we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences and discomfort you may have recently experienced at our resort. Please know that we are continuously improving our facilities and are currently in the process of replacing the carpeting in our units and have plans to upgrade the living rooms, dining rooms, and loft areas in the future. I can assure you that the experience you have described is completely atypical to a standard stay at Pointe Estero, and we hope that if your travels bring you back to our area, you will give our facilities another try. Again, we apologize for any frustrations you were caused. Please don’t hesitate to reach out if you would like to discuss your experience further.  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Book with great caution...
review: It was my first time visiting this resort. Very spacious rooms, kitchen, well furnished. Normally I can’t sleep first night in hotel but pillow and bed were super comfortable...fell asleep first night. Huge beach with white powdery sand. Beautiful sunsets. Great outdoor bar 2 buildings down to the north to drink, listen to live music, watch sports.  Our room had a good view but our friends had room 302 which had an amazing view of the beach. For dining I recommend salty crabs. Great food, great Service. Have hotel give you 10 % off coupon. Live singer.  Overall great experience. Hotel and room very clean.

title: Pointe Estero is the place to be .....
review: Been going here annualy for over 13 years, every time we say we’re going to try somewhere else next time .....and every year we come back !  It has its faults, but once you accept them you’ll realise that this really is the best for the perfect beachside vacation.  All the usual things to say ie/ Perfect location, fabulous beach, excellent facilities etc.  but you need to know one or two things.  There is NO daily maid service so you need to make your own bed and tidy your own rooms. If you’re there over a certain time they will pop in, or you can ask at the desk.  Rooms are fabulous and the bathrooms, showers, kitchen etc are all up to standard. Only thing that lets the whole experience down is ..the quality of the Televisions. If you like your TV of an evening, then you’ll be…

title: Very disappointing
review: Dear StephenJNolan,  Thank you for leaving us a detailed review and for being such a loyal guest! Nothing makes us happier than a guest who frequents our resort year after year and continuously has wonderful experiences. We do apologize if the TVs were not to your liking. Further, please know that all suites receive a complimentary full service cleaning every 10 nights. We also offer trash and towels service for $15/day and full service cleaning available for $35/day. We appreciate you reaching out to us and look forward to your next visit with us!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Place is Awesome
review: We planned a family vacation and reserved an ocean view unit.  Upon arrival, we were told there were no ocean view units available, even though we had already paid in full.  Instead, we got a view of the building next to us.  They agreed to move us to another room half way through our vacation so we packed our bags and waited.  They couldn't seem to coordinate the move and were extremely rude.  If that weren't enough, the ice machine was out of order and we were told to go to the building next door if we wanted ice.  Vending machine by the pool was out of order as well.  And forget about trying to get on wi-fi.  We made the best of it and had a great time.  We'll be going back to Ft. Myers, just not Pointe Estero.

title: A Great First Family Vacation!!
review: Dear mr0d222,  Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns. As you can imagine, we are disappointed to hear of your dissatisfaction during your recent stay. At Pointe Estero, we are highly dedicated to providing our guests with a superior level of service and sincerely apologize if this was not reflective during your interactions with some of our team members. I can assure you that the experience you have described is completely atypical to a standard stay at Pointe Estero, and we hope that if your travels bring you back to our area, you will give our facilities another try. Again, we apologize for any frustrations you were caused. Please don’t hesitate to reach out if you would like to discuss your experience further.  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: A little dated
review: Just don't try to to check in too early....when they say 2 they mean 2, just one of the deals there!  The balconies are great, rooms are great, kitchens are great!  it's all pretty great.  They charge enough as well...if the rooms cost very much higher they would not be worth it.  GREAT POOL!  Seemed very clean!

title: A week at the beach
review: First a big shout out to LOUIS at the customer service desk.  The type of personality that guest like to be greeted with.  We found ourselfs walking to customer desk just to say "hi" and listen to his positive attitude and having a solution for most guest problems on the way to the pool area or huge beach area.  The beach view rooms have sunsets you will have a hard time forgetting.  Rooms are spacious with a good layout and great beach view screened in balconies.  Ceiling fans on balconies would be a good improvement and also save on utility cost.The kitchen, carpet and furniture could use updates. Needs small restaurant or tiki bar onsite would also be a crowd favorite. Don't be confused with online site pictures, there is no lazy river. Us and a few other people was confused…

title: First Time visitor
review: We came to look over the area for a possible winter stay. We wanted an ocean view,easy beach access, near  food options and easy access to airport.Nothing too high. Good price points. With no car we had signed up for Uber..and had a wonderful experience.

title: best way to vacation
review: We found this resort several years ago and have returned several times, always helpful and friendly staff with very reasonable pricing for a beachfront resort. The condos are huge and pricing is comparable to area one room hotels. Every condo has two bedrooms(you can get one locked if not needed to save money), a full kitchen with plates and all utensils, washer and dryer in the condo, living room and dining room, every room has a screened in lanai to enjoy the views. A large pool, tennis court and new Weber grills surrounded by beautiful landscaping make for a very relaxing atmosphere, located right on a huge beach with a bird sanctuary close by provides plent of opportunity to see all sorts of wild life. located at the south end of Estero Island (ft myers beach), the noise…

title: Another Great Stay
review: Dear tomh6,  Thank you for staying at Pointe Estero and providing us with your comments. Nothing makes us happier than guests who frequent our resort year after year and continuously have wonderful experiences. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Employees are professional
review: We have stayed  here many times since 1992 - and always enjoy the whole resort. On the widest bit of the beach; great Condos (although our condo -  803 - was just a little tired with a rusty dishwasher and a threadbare sofa which is not the norm for Pointe Estero); wonderful pool and great landscaping making this always a relaxing luxury holiday for us.  Despite the rain (and it rained a lot for a couple of days) we found plenty to do.  We left as planned just a couple of days ahead of Hurricane Irma - and pray that the Resort and its employees all survived safely.

title: Beachfront Vacation : )
review: I was delighted with the size of the condo. The bathrooms have been updated and to have a washer dryer was quite convenient. However, the condo need to have the furnishing updated to correlate with the prices. The once tropical decor is now weathered & scratched. The mattresses is stiff and linens are not crisp. The bed linen were made up upside down with tags at head, which made me leery to use. Thankfully I brought my own.The floors were clean, with proof of the sock test.  The kitchen was lightly stocked with dishware & flatware, but it need to be cleaned before use. It was quiet and peaceful, close to many restaurants , plus there was a Publix close by to pick up snacks & drinks.

title: Great Resort
review: Dear ZFLPIGGY,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. While we’re glad you enjoyed our spacious accommodations and convenient, beachfront location, we’re disappointed to hear certain aspects of our resort did not meet your expectations. Please know that we are continuously improving our facilities and currently have plans to upgrade the living rooms, dining rooms, loft areas, and carpeting later this year. Should you choose to stay with us again, please feel free to reach out to us directly at any time and we will personally take care of you during your next stay.  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Vacation
review: Stayed here for 10 days for vacation/baseball tourney. The resort was very kid friendly and clean. The staff was really nice. The rooms were very spacious. We rented out gazebo for a team cookout. It was very reasonable. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Needs Updated
review: Great place.  Clean, friendly staff, good location, nice beach and incredible views from screened balcony. Layout of the 2 bedroom condo is ideal for families.  Everything we were looking for in a beach vacation

title: spoiled vacation
review: Nice location, beautiful views from our balcony on the 8th floor. Hotel staff was friendly, especially the young woman with dark hair who worked the front desk. Unfortunately, the place needs updated BADLY. Master bath is the only thing updated recently. Curtains in bedroom were so old that there were tiny little holes all over in them that you could see daylight through. It's like they were disintegrating away with age. Pool area and grounds were kept very clean and well landscaped.

title: Vacation
review: I have always gone to another property when going to Ft Meyers Beach. Honestly have to compare the two and Pointe Estero needs a huge upgrade. They said the redid the bathrooms, which were very nice, but the rest is totally outdated. There are mirrors everywhere. On closets, on walls with gold framing, behind the bar..to make it appear larger then it is . The layout is nice and master and 2nd bedroom are a decent size. Nice balconies, we reserve ocean view, but make sure you don't get the 1st floor, not much to see with the trees in the way. But when I went to use a towel in the bathroom, one was a dingy gray and the hand towel had makeup stains. There is no cleaning service throughout the stay and you have to go to the front desk if you need toilet paper. Not impressed with the…

title: First try at self catering
review: One bedroom suite - very spacious and clean.  Good kitchen facilities which we used for dinner, saving lots of money by shopping at nearby Publix. Screened Wraparound balcony with seating and tables which we used lots to enjoy view of gulf. Pool area very nice which we also used instead of lying on beach. Access to beach very easy though & amazing for walks & shell collecting. Couple of good local bars within 5 mins walking & reception helpful if you need a taxi into Times Square. Tram also available very cheap.  Work ongoing when we arrived which we weren't advised of & was quite disruptive & noisy . Raised this with reception who moved us & compensated us - hence the top rating WOULD DEFINITELY COME BACK

title: Amazing place by the sea!
review: Our expectations was high before our visit to Pointe Estero, and our expectations was fulfilled. Fantastic sea view, really nice staff og big rooms. The sunsets at Pointe Estero is just amazing, so every evening we had to take a walk at the beach and take some nice photos. Big kitchen so we could make nice food everyday. We give our greatest recommendations to this place, and will be back.

title: Fabulous family vacay!
review: This was such a great place for my family's first beach trip. Easy walk to the beach, great pool for when the beach sun got to strong, excellent views from our room, and fabulous extras all over. There was an "air station" to fill up our inflatables! Walked to CVS to get snacks, shoppped at Publix for most of our meals, and a couple of simple drives to some great local resteraunts. Loved it and will return!

title: Best Location on the Island
review: Dear Johanna O,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments with us. We’re so glad you had such an enjoyable time at our resort. It’s also great to hear our location worked so well for you. Your intent to return means a lot to us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Wedding and family vacation
review: Awesome place to relax! We enjoyed and entertained family and friends while staying here. The curved screened patios are amazing. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The landscape provided beautiful wedding pictures for us and our family. The staff were helpful and friendly. Olaf the hotel manager and his staff were the best!

title: Reunion
review: We were here for a family reunion and had a beach front condo. The room was great. Beautiful view, loved the wrap around balcony.  Enjoyed having a kitchen but the "fully equipped " was overstating it. I would say it was adequate; ok for sandwiches and a simple meal but if you want to cook anything more you might not have what you need. Loved the wristband door keys as I always lose or deactivate mine. Some of the staff were super friendly though there was one who appeared as though we were putting them out. They were under going some repairs but kept them to short hours to not be disturbing. Elevators are slow at busy times of day but I've encountered this at similar properties. I would definitely return.

title: Exceptional
review: We only stayed overnight at this beachfront condo resort.  Management was great and helpful.   We had a one bedroom with superset living room.  Rental for movies was free.   The pool is great and the guys on the beachfront are great either the chairs and umbrellas  Brought our own dinner to heat up and the kitchen had every gadget that we needed Coffee in the lobby in the morning  Location was two blocks from Santini plaza with places to eat and the grocery store was close by too.    Can't say a bad thing.   Great for a long or short stay !!!!

title: Amazing!!
review: We booked this hotel as a recommendation from a friend. The rooms were older decor but nicely maintained and were just as pictured. The front desk staff was very nice and helpful. The access to the beach is fantastic. The kitchen was well equipped and the cleanliness of the room is exceptional. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Comfort and views right on the beach
review: Dear akabala,  Thank you for staying at Pointe Estero and providing us with your feedback. We’re so glad you had such an enjoyable stay, from our friendly team to our fully appointed accommodations. We appreciate your comments and hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Worst experience ever
review: $350 for two nights.  We checked in at 8pm, walked through the room, it looked ok.  We went to have dinner and returned at 10:30.  The front desk closes at 10:00, there is nobody there.  We go back to the room to shower, the washcloths are wet, and now we see that the towels are dirty.  Disgusting, it's about to get worse.  We pull back the bedspread, the sheets are all wrinkled and dirty.  Smells like sweat, and god knows what else.    Again, nobody works here after 10.  Never have I stayed in such a dirty place.

title: Not a bad place to stay 👍
review: Dear Greeneyz,  Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns. We sincerely apologize if the cleanliness of your accommodation was not up to par. I can assure you that the description of your stay is not at all reflective of a typical Pointe Estero experience. Again, we apologize for any frustrations encountered during your recent stay. Please feel free to reach out to me directly if you’d like to discuss your experience further.  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Fantastic vacation!!
review: We spent 4nights here in May. We had a 2 bedroom suite on the 15h floor (next to top) with a nice view of the beach.  The suite was well maintained and clean but it's seen better times. The furnishings are nice but dated and the kitchen cupboards are old fashioned. The tumble dryer is squeaky and noisy, but the washer works ok.  There are only 2 lifts to serve 16floors so some longish waits are to be expected.  The pool area is nice, complimentary coffee available before 12.00, and the pool water was bath warm 👍 The beach is lovely, clean and tidy and the guys who do the sun beds etc are very efficient.  All in all we had a nice stay here, it's not too bad at all 😎

title: Wonderful view and great apartment
review: Always a wonderful stay! Very well maintained condo. Everything you could want! We've been coming here for at least 20 years. Love this place!😊 Beautiful pool and jacuzzi. Right on the beach. Close to restaurants. Quiet end of the island is what we enjoy!

title: Amazing room and view!
review: Dear Roxyudog,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments with us. Nothing makes us happier than guests who frequent our resort year after year and continuously have wonderful experiences. From our fully appointed accommodations to our beachfront location, it sounds like your stay was top notch! We appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit with us.  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Great location, okay accommodations, Spring Break pricing grossly inflated
review: We have been to this resort a few times before, including at different times of the year.  The pricing at Spring Break was significantly inflated (naturally), and unfortunately, the accommodations just do not justify that price tag.  For what we paid, we have stayed at all-inclusives in Mexico (with excellent service, rooms, etc.)  Our Simple pro's and con's :  Pros :  - Excellent location, great beach. - Nice pool area - Wrist bands replace cards to enter room and pool area - very convenient - Rooms are spacious - decent Wifi (allowed for streaming video to AppleTV we brought) - Free Coffee in AM in lobby - In room washer dryer, with free additional detergent by request - Great screened porches - very relaxing in AM and evenings - Plenty of free ice for your beach coolers  Cons…

title: Great Place for a Beach Vacation
review: This is one of the most spacious place on the beach. Every morning you wake up to the sight of the ocean. All you nee to be is on the 3rd floor or higher an you can see the ocean. I have stayed at many of the other places on the beach and this is by far the best facility for the best price. We will be back next year extending our stay by 6 nights. The price you pay is a little high, but this is well worth it!

title: Great place to take your family!
review: We have kids from 8-17 and there is a lot to do.  This is the best beach ever!  Lots of fun things to see at the beach; sand dollars, shells, starfish and dolphins.  Puffy white sand, rental chairs and cabanas.  Great location on the quite side of the island.  No crazy party people (for the most part).  The northern side has a lot of bars and it tends to get a little crazy after 9.  The rooms are ok.  We don't stay in the rooms long, so a room is a room.  Nice master with huge shower.  Nice balcony overlooking the ocean.  Gorgeous sunsets.  You can't go wrong here.  Friendly staff, nice pool...just add sun and it's perfect!

title: Great option on the quiet end of the island
review: Dear 2ndfret,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your recent experience with us. From our beautiful white sand beaches to our friendly team, it sounds like your stay was ideal. We appreciate your feedback and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: NEEDS Upgrades desperately!
review: We spent a couple of weeks at Pointe Estero in February and enjoyed it very much. We had a two bedroom oceanfront unit on a higher floor. Our particular unit (#1404) could have used with some updating inside regarding the furniture and fixtures, but it had a great floorplan and was well equipped.  The mirrored walls took some time to get used to and made us feel like we were in the 1970s. The unit included a full kitchen and a washer and dryer. We also used the Weber gas grills outside near the pool to cook a couple of times. They were clean and well-maintained. There is a small workout room, a decent pool and hot-tub, plenty of parking and easy beach access. The balconies were 100% screened in, which was nice so we could leave the doors open, but it did take away from the view…

title: Fabulous Get-Away!!!
review: My husband and I had an amazing 4 night get-away here and absolutely loved it!  The location on this beautiful beach was great!  The 2 bedroom condo had a view of the ocean from every room.  A wrap-around balcony was the perfect place to watch the sunset.  The 2nd bedroom even had a balcony!  Updated bathrooms & all rooms very spacious but the kitchen could use some love - outdated a scarcely stocked - difficult to cook a full course meal with what they supply.

title: Phenomenal view - updating needed
review: The staff is great, the room layout for beachfront is perfect and the property is conveniently located to many of the local amenities.  However this place is quite pricey in relation to other options.  The room is huge (we rented a 1 bedroom) but the carpet is old, the pillows are the worst I've ever tried to use (unusable - had to go buy two at Costco), and the kitchen utensils are almost unusable because they are of such low quality.  All that being said I would definitely stay here again if we were to come back but I'd bring my own frying pan, pillows, and wine glasses.  Also they do not offer any maid service during the week - not even once.  There is no restaurant on site either.

title: Absolutely amazing!
review: Dear tdwallst,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments with us. While we’re glad you enjoyed our friendly team and beachfront location, we’re disappointed to hear certain aspects of our resort did not meet your expectations. Please know that all suites receive complimentary full service cleaning every 10 nights. Trash and towel service is also available for $15/day and we do offer full service cleaning for $35/day. We appreciate your feedback and will certainly use your experience to focus on areas in which we may improve.  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Wonderful location, right on beach
review: I had an absolutely amazing vacation in Pointe Estero with my parents and my kids. The hotel is just amazing. It is beautiful very well- maintained property: great swimming pool, hot tub, tennis court, picturesque paths to the beach... The rooms were clean, spacious and professionally designed. The view was absolutely magnificent and what I really appreciated was the mosquito nets on the balcony everywhere so you can enjoy sea air without fear of mosquitoes and the necessity to use chemicals to keep them away. They have complimentary coffee from 8 am till noon. The rooms have washing machine, dryer, full kitchen, dish- washing machine. Another huge plus of the hotel is its location. It is in a nice area further from all the tourist noise and fuss but at the sane time Marina…

title: "Excellent Short Stay"
review: Excellent staff. Full kitchen and laundry in room. Furniture is getting old. TV's need to be replaced. Lousy TV cable. Excellent Internet. Best location on island.  Only easy way off island is by going south. North part of island is not easily accessible secondary to road work.

title: Always a great stay..
review: This was our 5th Trip to Point Estero and the resort and service were as good as always.The unit was available and clean upon arrival. The kitchen was stocked as usual and any extra utensils that were asked for were provided quickly. The Pool area was pristine and the BBQs are quality and always available. The Resort is  looked after daily and the employees are always there to help. A special Thank You to Oleg who handled all requests and concerns with a professional attitude and complete follow ups. Thank You Pointe Estero for a wonderful Trip...See You Next Year...

title: Nice place if you want R&R
review: Dear bluejay750,  Thanks so much for leaving us a flattering review and for being such a loyal guest. From the cleanliness of our accommodations to our friendly team, it sounds like your stay was top notch! I look forward to sharing your kind words with Oleg and the rest of our team and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Almost 5 Stars!
review: We went with our two adult sons for a few days of relaxation that included Christmas and Christmas eve. The condo we had was two separated bedrooms. We had expansive views of the Gulf of Mexico from near-wrap around screened-in balconies plus two bathrooms; the master one had a shower that could fit a crowd! Full kitchen, laundry in the apartment and a living room/dining room made for plenty of space for our family. The swimming pool and jacuzzi, tennis court and bocce ball court were all in excellent condition and we enjoyed them all. It was nice that they offered coffee in the lobby every morning till noon. And they did have some selection of games to play that we borrowed for evening entertainment.  My reason for giving the resort 4 instead of 5 stars (perfect) amounts to a…

title: Family Christmas on the Beach!
review: Dear Nancy27614,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a detailed review. While we’re glad you enjoyed our fully appointed accommodations and on property amenities, we’re disappointed to hear certain aspects of our resort did not meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback and will certainly use your experience to focus on areas in which we may improve.  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Perfect piece of paradise
review: We needed a couple of rooms at Ft Myers Beach for one night and stumbled across Pointe Estero Resort on the internet.  I was able to get a 2 room apartment for what I would have expected to pay for a single hotel room.  I booked a Gulf View but on arrival was upgraded to a Beach View.  Wow!  The apartment was stunning, with 2 good sized bedrooms, both ensuite.  In addition we had a full kitchen, living room, dining area and laundry facilities as well as loads of lanai space, looking right onto the beach.  The apartment was stunning and very well maintained.    I would have given it 5 stars if the resort had a restaurant/bar.  Unfortunately it did not.  We brought our own wine and ordered take out pizza (delivered right to our apartment door) as we didn't want to be anywhere…

title: Great stay.
review: Two bedroom, two bath beach front ocean view. Great swimming pool, nice grilling area for BBQ. Walking distance to bars and restaurants. Great beach for a great walk. Short distance from downtown. Walk or take the trolley.

title: Loved being directly on the beach!
review: Awesome trip and stay! Room was awesome with plenty of space.  Wrap around balcony with tables and chairs were awesome for a sunrise and morning coffee.  Pool and Spa was fantastic with plenty of lounge chairs for everyone.  Great place!

title: Dinner
review: If you're looking for good ole Italian this is the place. It was recommended to us by neighbors. We do live here full time & go out to eat quite often but never knew of Ninos. The owners are there all the time & always check to make sure all good. We brought friends their last night. Couldn't say enough. Will definitely be back. The veal is melt in your mouth

title: THE place to stay in Fort Myers
review: Stayed here with my family in a two bedroom unit. If you're coming to Fort Myers and want a clean, well run, affordable place, look no further. The place is quiet, clean, 5-star appointed, and in a fantastic location on the south side of the island. The beach is right out of the lobby, and it is powder-white sand. All the rooms have ocean views and screened verandas so you can eat outside and watch both sunrises and sunsets. Linens are top-notch and the beds are among the most comfortable we've ever slept in (and we travel a lot). Both bath AND beach towels are provided (6 of each) as well as a washer-dryer in the room. The resort provides free dish detergent, laundry detergent, coffee, creamer and resupplies it for free. There is not housekeeping service, but there is a vacuum…

title: Third Time Back with Girlfriends for Shopping Trip
review: Dear Charles H,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a thorough review. We’re so glad you had such an enjoyable stay at our resort, from our beachfront location to our fully appointed accommodations. We appreciate your feedback and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing getaway!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Relax and enjoy
review: We stayed in this hotel in February of 2016.  Very, very nice.  Our room was on the northeast of the hotel but we had a view of the beach and the street/tennis courts.   Coffee was available every morning in the lobby area.   Shops and restaurants were only a short walk or drive away.  Grocery store, pharmacy about five minutes away.  We had a two-bedrom condo.  Plenty of space for everyone.  Beds were very comfortable with lots of closet and drawer space.  The kitchen was well stocked with all of the necessary cooking utensils and pans.  Washer and dryer in each room for an added bonus.  The master bathroom had two sinks and the shower was a very spacious walk-in.  The guest bathroom had a regular sink, tub/shower and plenty of storage.  Wi-fi was free but a little spotty in…

title: More than 25 years of perfect experiences at Pointe Estero
review: I have stayed at Pointe Estero more than 15 times over the years. I don't want to be anywhere else when I visit southwest Florida. Always perfectly maintained, updated frequently, with beautiful grounds and the best beach in Fort Myers. Clean, comfortable, and the staff couldn't be nicer.

title: Wonderful Find on Estero Beach
review: Dear scbompadre,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your kind words with us. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to showing you another wonderful stay in the near future. Until then!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Vacation
review: We just returned from a much too short stay at Pt Estero Beach Resort. I highly recommend the Ocean Front rooms. The staff is very friendly, beach is beautiful white sand and room amenities had everything we needed. Near enough to a Publix grocery store if you need a quick nosh or bottle of your favorite wine. Definitely would go back.

title: Amazing again.
review: We were on the 10th floor ocean front.  Beautiful view. Top quality room.  Plenty of room for 6 people.  Beds comfortable. Veranda view excellent. Kitchen facilities top notch.  Staff very, very helpful. Pool great, had 2 grandchildren with us.  Beach & beach chairs very nice.

title: Lovely place to stay
review: Nice 2 bed apartments with a Gulf beach view.  Nicely finished with good bathrooms. Only negative point is that as the sun moves to the beach side and the pool on the roadside of the building gets shaded.  I the afternoon a wind whips up between the adjacent property and makes it not so pleasant to sit on the balcony.  Just minor points and everything else was fine.  We will visit this place again.

title: Relaxing weekend
review: Easy check in and check out. Relaxing location with food close enough or just buy your ingredients and cook a romantic meal. Leaving the property is a choice not a must. Love it and will be back.  The beach is right out back. The pool was warm and comfortable. Peaceful Ocean view from the balcony.

title: Lovely accommodation with everything you need!
review: This was a very well appointed apartment with everything you need for a great holiday experience.  The sunset over the ocean was amazing!  The pool area is set out in a really nice way and you have use of barbecues if you wish to BBQ for your meals!  I would highly recommend the comfortable and spacious accommodation.

title: First time renting a condo
review: First time renting a condo and have been very pleased with the experience.  Beautiful property and will definitely stay here again. Not near as crowded in this beach area. Plenty of beach to explore and hunt shells.

title: Great stay on the beach
review: Interestingly, someone recently reviewed Suite 202, which was the same unit we had. Initial comment to set context - this is not a resort in the usual sense, it's a condo with services, and a great beach, so no Tiki Bar, no restaurant etc. If you need that, this isn't the spot for you. However, if you like a clean, well maintained spot on the beach where you can control your own agenda, this is ideal.   The two bedroom suite was very nice, clean, outstanding shower off the master bedroom, lots of space to spread out, and two balconies overlooking the beach. Kitchen was well equipped and service was good (extra pillows, blown fuse - addressed immediately). We opted to have one full service cleaning during our one week stay, and you have everything necessary to do whatever else…

title: On Pointe Estero Resort
review: Settled in instantly. We love this place, our spacious appt felt just like home, everything you could possibly need. The pool and grounds are beautiful with just a short stroll to the vast white sandy  beach. We definitely will all be fed up to leave.

title: Beautiful Condo - Outstanding Staff - "Like Home" property
review: We have stayed at Pointe Estero five or six different times - and we love it even more every single time we come for a visit! The grounds are beautiful, very well kept...the condo itself is spacious and very clean and gorgeous. They have updated the master bath and it now has an incredible shower in a very large bathroom. The pool is large with ample seating. The staff is very knowledgeable and SO friendly! The local Publix is just up the road and there are many great restaurants nearby. I have to say that I am a person that doesn't normally sleep well away from home - but I have always slept like a baby when we stay here because it feels just like home!

title: Low floor still great!
review: This was our third visit to Pointe Estero and once again found the property to be great,  We've had higher floors with great views but this time only #202 was available - while we had written ahead and requested a higher floor, we were okay with the accommodations - they were updated and spotless.   Have stayed at other Ft Myers (Sanibel, Captiva and Siesta Key )  resorts and none have come close to Pointe Estero.  If you're picky about decor,  space and cleanliness etc,   book this.

title: Pointe Estero - stunning views on Fort Myers Beach, but expensive
review: Dear drsdwd,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. Nothing makes us happier than repeat guests who continuously have wonderful stays at our resort. We appreciate your kind words and hope to have you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Wonderful place to enjoy the beach and relax
review: We have been traveling to Fort Myers Beach, Florida for more than 25 years. I have stayed at many places there, but mostly at Pointe Estero. The rooms are great and the views are amazing. The rooms are set up to maximize the views, which I really like. The rooms are newly updated, clean and comfortable. Those are the good things. However, over the years, the rates have risen at a very fast pace. It is one of the most expensive places on the beach in Fort Myers. The staff is friendly and helpful for the most part; but, we have had a few experiences with the front desk staff that left us feeling like our business really wasn't that important to them.

title: So pleasant!
review: We stayed at Pointe Estero resort in the "off season".  We are used to the Northeast USA beaches.  The off season where we live is cold.  It was warm in the off season and not crowded at all.  The hotel and grounds were very well kept.  For anyone traveling by plane-- you are supplied with dish liquid, dish machine detergent, laundry detergent & fabric softener, coffee, sugar and creamer in the kitchen.  Washer & dryer in kitchen closet.  The 2 bathrooms have bar soap, body lotion, shampoo & conditioner, q-tips and cotton balls, makeup removing towelettes.  The master bathroom has a hair dryer.  The master bathroom has a shower that would be considered handicap accessible.  The spray comes from the ceiling and there is a ramp into the shower.  There is also a seat in the shower.…

title: Great Stay!!! Will be back!!!
review: This was my first stay at Pointe Estero.The facilities are clean and well kept. The condo was spacious and equipped with the basics for a comfortable stay. You can bring your own food and groceries, or select from the many restaurants and bars near the resort.        The beach is beautiful with the perfect setting for great sunsets and shell collecting. There are beach chairs and umbrellas for daily or weekly rental. There is also kayak, paddleboard and waverunner rentals for your adventurous side.  My family and myself had a wonderful time. This was a great stay and definitively will be back.

title: Beautiful Beach
review: I go to Point Estero once and if possible twice a year. Condos are clean with beachfront views of the Gulf that are breathtaking. I would not stay any place else. I have been going there for 10 yrs or so.

title: Feels like home
review: Dear nursenindy,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments with us. Nothing makes us happier than repeats guests who continuously have wonderful stays at our resort, year after year. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to your next visit with us!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Fantastic stay
review: Very nice place to vacation at, you don't have to pay for parking you can bring your own food very nice restaurants and beer bars up and down the street if you're looking for a place to relax please book this you will not be disappointed I promise

title: Fab location
review: I booked this without understanding that it is not a hotel, but a resort, in that it is a block of condo style suites, right on the beach,   but my lack of understanding was a real advantage as this suited out needs brilliantly.  It maybe a little dated, but all the furnishings and fittings are in good order and the layout of the suite is brilliant.  We had two bedrooms, a kitchen, and living dining area that was really spacious.  You just go out the door down a short path and you are on the beach.
