There are restaurants nearby and also a supermarket. Allow time to get through the traffic when you get unto the beach area, as there can be lots of cars at certain times of the day. We loved our stay here and were sorry we had only 2nights.

title: Beautiful place
review: Dear quilter9,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you had such a great time at our resort, from our spacious accommodations to our convenient, beachfront location. While we’re sad that you had to leave as well, we trust that you will come back and see us again soon. Until then!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: great place to stay
review: Love this place.. I been there a couple time and is one of my favorite at fort meyers, the pool  and barbecuere aerea is really nice .... The apartment are big, clean and completely equipped!!!! Definitely love it and I recommend it all the time

title: Our favorite home away from home!
review: Dear Karina S,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments with us. We’re so flattered to hear you consider us one of your favorite resorts on Fort Myers Beach! We appreciate your kind words and hope you come back and see us again soon.  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: The Widest Beach on Fort Myers.
review: This was our first time at Point Estero so we weren't sure what to expect.  The resort exceeded my expectations.  I wasn't planning to have paper products, shampoos, soaps, beach towels, etc. provided in our condo.  The grounds were beautiful.  The pool and spa area were great as well.  We loved our stay and look forward to coming back!  The free wifi was surprisingly good, as we all used our phones and streamed movies without issue.

title: Memorial Weekend Fun
review: This hotel is in a great location, trolley stop right outside.  Rooms are spacious and well maintained.  The beach is great and relaxing.  BBQ/Pool area is great for family gatherings, with tables and umbrellas.

title: Very pleasant stay
review: Dear Maggie m,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your comments with us. We’re so glad you had such an enjoyable stay, from our spacious accommodations to our beautiful beachfront location. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Wonderful hotel
review: We have stayed here several times. Very clean and spacious condo suites. New walk in shower rooms are very modern and up to date. We do feel further updates are required to other areas and equipment in the suites but this would not stop us staying here. Pool area and gardens are very tastefully done which lead directly on to the beach. Staff are very friendly in particular i would like to commend Oleg the guest services manager who was a great help in extending our stay. Nothing is too much trouble for him . It is clear he engages well with guests and colleagues . He is so friendly and very easy to deal with . Thank you.

title: WONDERFUL
review: Dear 4GG60,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you had such a great time at our resort, from our spacious accommodations to our beautiful pool deck. Oleg is a wonderful asset to our team and we’re so glad he was able to make your stay extra special. I look forward to sharing your kind words with him and the rest of our team and hope you come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: April 2016 Pointe Estero Beach Resort
review: Wonderful place to stay.  The rooms are huge and similar to a large condo with full kitchen, living room, huge outdoor, screened-in patio that overlooks the ocean.  The hotel, rooms, pool area and general facilities are kept very clean.  The pool area is beautiful landscaped.  Also has a great beach area.  We really enjoyed Pinchers Restaurant and happy hour and Outriggers Tiki Bar, both only a 3 minute walk from the resort.  We will definately be back again.

title: Relaxing
review: Very nice appartments with good infrastructure. Great location by the beach, Tennis courts for free and nice pool area including spaa. We were here for the third time and have met many other "regulars"

title: Beach vacation
review: Dear Mark L,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. Nothing makes us happier than guests who continuously have great stays at our resort. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Love this place
review: This was our first trip to Florida and it was fantastic. Pointe Estero was a great place to stay. It was clean, staff was very polite, and we felt safe! The pool area was nice and never too crowded. The white sandy beach was beautiful. I would definitely recommend Pointe Estero for families or couples!

title: Restful Week
review: Dear jms_1708,  Thank you for leaving us such a flattering review! It’s a huge compliment to us that we’ve secured such a positive, lasting impression, from our friendly team to our beautiful beachfront location. We appreciate your feedback and hope you join us again soon for another relaxing stay!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Loved our unit, except...
review: We have stayed here several times and are always pleased with out stay. The units are great and the views are beautiful. The grounds of the hotel are very well kept and the pool area is great. The staff is very friendly and accommodating to your needs. The resort is child friendly and had everything we needed for our 1 year old. The beach is beautiful and you can rent chairs for the day at a great price. This is our go to place for rest and relaxation.

title: Very nice 2 Bdrm Condo with two porches with panoramic gulf views
review: Last year we stayed at the large 3 bdrm Gullwing condos (next door) and were very pleased but this year we booked too late so we tried the 2 bdrm Pointe Estero condos since they said they had a pull out bed/couch combo.  Pointe Estero was built before Gullwing and is owned by the same company but has a larger, well manicured lot and grounds that are absolutely beautiful.  We found the pool to be much nicer than Gullwing and there was even a little Cabana that we rented for an evening and grilled out some freshly caught fish.  Pointe Estero is 16 floors with half the rooms facing the back bay and half facing the gulf.  The master bedroom (King Bed) has it's own bathroom with a HUGE shower and the 2nd bedroom has a cute smaller private bathroom.  The 2nd bedroom had double single…

title: Great!
review: Dear honestreviews40,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a detailed review. We’re happy to hear you had a great time at our resort, from our pool area to our fully appointed accommodations. Your intent to return means a lot to us and we look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Our second say here.
review: From the moment we checked in until the day we left, we had a wonderful experience at Pointe Estero Resort. The condo was beautiful, clean and right on the beach! The staff were all very pleasant and helpful. I would highly recommend this resort.

title: Could not be better
review: Dear agsas76,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We’re happy to hear how much you enjoyed your stay, from our friendly team to our wonderful accommodations. We appreciate your input and hope we have the chance to have you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Curt Brenner – General Manager

title: Absolutely wonderful!
review: We were a party of 4 checking in for a one week stay. I had requested an upper floor in this 16 story facility. Upon arrival they had us booked into a 4th floor room. I reiterated my request and after a bit of searching, they moved us to the 11th floor.  This is a very clean, well maintained facility mid-island.  The 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo was also well maintained and clean.  The pool has plenty of chairs and is likely less used than the beach.  My ONLY gripe is that their internet is poor. It was very difficult to maintain a connection for any period of time (and we tried 2 PC's and 3 phones).  This is exactly the same experience we had last October! Would I stay here again? Yes.

title: Just OK - Could be great
review: I booked a 2 BR Oceanview unit for my wife, daughter, grandson, mother-in-law and myself for a short getaway.  The view was fine, but I don't think I would want to get below the 5th floor or trees may block your view.  Overall our 3 night stay was OK, but if this was a romantic getaway, it would have not been OK.  The unit was plenty big enough and everyone enjoyed the screened porches.  But, there was a musty smell in the background (I believe the AC is oversized so there is insufficient dehumidification (the engineer in me)) and it was what we call "Florida clean" (that is an overall fairly poor cleanliness we find all over Florida) kitchen counters were clean, but gritty from a cleanser, thick dust on top of TV cabinets, trash under beds and behind dressers.  Plenty of…

title: Spring Break 2016
review: Dear Mike G,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a thorough review. While we’re glad you enjoyed our on property amenities and outdoor balconies, we’re disappointed to hear certain aspects of our resort did not meet your expectations. It’s incredibly important for us to hear from guests like yourself so that we can focus on areas in which we may improve.  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Great Beach and Location!! Nicely Appointed Rooms!!
review: Had another great spring break at Pointe Estero. They are in the best location, best beach and great pool and hot tub. Love the newly remodeled master bath! Staff was very friendly as always. Best place to stay on the south side of Fort Myers Beach.

title: Great Beach
review: Dear juliejones13,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a flattering review. We couldn’t be happier to hear you consider us the best place to stay in Fort Myers Beach! We appreciate your kind words and hope you come back and see us again soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Great for Families
review: We loved our time at this property!  The rooms were gorgeous and well stocked.  The pool area was very nice as well and we lived in there when we weren't at the beach.  The views from the room were amazing.  This is a great property for families with small children.

title: Vp fortune 500 co.
review: Fantastic....best expirence ever!!!!!! Everyone was friendly, knowledgeable and available to help us. We are planning to return at least twice every year. If you are looking to stay at an exceptional place that holds customers to the highest level......this is the place.

title: girls trip
review: Dear Dick B,  Thanks so much for leaving us such a flattering review. We’re so glad you had such an enjoyable stay with us and intend to return! We look forward to having you as our guest again soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Wonderful
review: Great accommodations.  Fun cooking in, eating out, playing tennis, hanging in pool and hot tub and at beach.  Nice view of gulf from deck/porch.  Located 3.2 miles from Lovers Key State Park. Very cozy beds and bathrooms.  Second bedroom would benefit from a ceiling fan.  Good staff that was very accommodating...brought us extra wine glasses.

title: Overcharged without explanation!
review: Dear CVL55,  Thank you for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. It’s wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed your stay, from our comfortable accommodations to our friendly team. We appreciate your kind words and hope you come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Always amazing
review: OK, let's just get this out of the way: this place is pricey.  But oh, the views and the comfort!  We had a room on the 10th floor - our room was not ocean front, yet we had a spectacular view of the beach from our screened balcony.  And windows on the other side of the condo overlooked the bay.   Master bath featured a huge walk-in shower lined with stone (travertine, I think?) and there was a rain showerhead. You could stand in the shower and look out the windows at a view of the bay.   King bed in the master bedroom was very comfy. Kitchen was well stocked and easy to cook in - we ate ALL of our meals there or on the balcony, rather than going out.  Condo included a second bedroom with twin beds, a second bath with tub, and a stacking washer / dryer.  Our room was very clean.…

title: Great Condo, Beach area is needing a little work.
review: Our room was 304 W and was perfect.  Enormous and comfortable.  The Three!! yes Three balconies were fantastic and two faced the Gulf of Mexico directly!  The furniture was comfortable.  The master bedroom had the biggest shower I have ever seen with a huge rainfall showerhead.  The second bedroom has a tub.  The beach needs a boardwalk or something because there was water standing and it was full of bird Poo.

title: A little disappointed.
review: Dear PDQF,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recap with us. We’re delighted to hear how much you enjoyed our spacious accommodations, newly renovated bathrooms and private balconies. We appreciate your feedback and hope you come see us again soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Loved the condo - family friendly
review: We have stayed at the sister property Gullwing next door over the last several years and was surprised that this place was not the same quality. Older furnishings, Beds were old and a little broken down. It was clean but seemed a little worn out. The second bathroom shower curtain had mold and mildew on it,when I complained the evening desk girl wanted me to put the new one up,I told her to have housekeeping do it in the morning. I stopped at the desk to see if the message was relayed and it was not so I asked the desk person to please have it changed because we were going out for the day. Then the storms rolled in and the lobby flooded and they had their hands full the rest of the weekend and the shower curtain never got changed and we all just shared the one bathroom. Can't…

title: Perfect Relaxing Beach Vacation
review: Dear rduke268,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. As you can imagine, it’s very disappointing to hear about your recent experience with us. Please know that we take all feedback seriously and any such issue is shared with our team so that we can improve and continue our effort to provide the best service possible. We hope you have the chance to stay with us again so that we may have the opportunity to improve upon your recent visit.  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Real treat for the famkli
review: We had a great 2 bedroom.  We faced the ocean - South/Southwest, 7th floor with wrap around balcony with seating for 8.  Balconies are screened in and huge. The kitchen was one of the best stocked, it made cooking for my family much easier.  If you needed extra soap or detergent, it was free at the desk.   WiFi had great speed. The staff at the desk were helpful.  No problem with access to a printer to print boarding passes.  Pinchers is within 5 minute walk of the resort with great evening music.    The beach had great sand - not too shelly.  It is groomed.  There are several stand you can rent umbrellas and chairs from at $20 / day or $100 for the week.  They were also able to arrange for para-sailing and dolphin watching.  The pool and hot tub were a good size, with plenty of…

title: Perfect stay
review: We had a spatious 2 bedroom fully equipped apartment in 14th floor: great sights to the beach and bayside. Spatious balcony. Nice pool/garden area and direct access to beautiful peaceful white-sanded beach. Stayed only 2 nights, but would love to stay longer...

title: Beautiful place
review: Dear Jarkko L,  Thanks so much for your kind words. While we’re sad you had to leave as well, we trust that you will come back and stay with us again soon. Until then!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Awesome condo resort... Especially the penthouse suite!
review: We have stayed here twice now and this place is great. 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condos with full kitchens and laundry in room. We were treated great both times. We loved it so much the first time that we came back a year later and had our wedding on the beach in front of the hotel. The views from the beachfront condos are great. We had the beachfront penthouse suite this time for our wedding and it is amazing. Watching the sunset from the rooftop is priceless. The first of the 2 pictures is from the 7th floor balcony off the master bedroom. The 2nd picture is of the sunset from the rooftop.

title: Beyond expectations
review: Dear Greg K,  What an honor to be a part of your special day! We couldn’t be more flattered that you chose us and are so happy to hear how amazing everything went. Being the highest resort on Estero Island really does allow for the most incredible views you can’t find anywhere else and we're glad to hear you were able to enjoy this during your stay with us. Come back and see us again soon, perhaps for your anniversary? Until then!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Beauty and the Beach
review: The 2 bedroom units are very roomy (1700 sf) but the penthouse suite has an additional loft (accessed by a spiral staircase) that has a fireplace and leads out to the rooftop where you have an absolutely spectacular view of either the gulf, city, or bay , must  include views of two of the 3 and are just breathtaking! If your celebrating a special occasion or really looking to impress someone while in Fort myers Beach....this is a definite winner!   Francine

title: Pointe Estero Beach Resort
review: My husband, Shawn and I had a wonderful stay at Pointe Estero Beach Resort in November of 2015.  The condo was spacious, very clean, and well deocorated.  The location was great with a beautiful view of the gulf.  The staff were very friendly, knowlegable and accomodating. We would definitley recommend this resort! Christine Pater

title: I am a retired sr. Vp of a Fortune 500 company celebrating my 69th birthday at Pointe Estero for my first visit.
review: Dear Chris_pater,  We are so flattered by your wonderful review. From our spacious accommodations to our friendly staff, it sounds like your stay was ideal! We appreciate your kind words and look forward to having you as a guest again soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Continues to be an excellent resort
review: I have stayed in hundreds of hotels and condominiums in my 38 years of corporate life.  Trust me when I say that this was the absolute best vacation I ever had. The facility is remarkable, the employees were fantastic and I can't tell you enough how great the whole experience was.  Dick Brouwer

title: 1st floor beach views are partially obstructed
review: Dear Dick B,  Thanks so much for leaving us such an incredible review. We are so flattered to hear that you consider us the best resort that you’ve stayed at - what a wonderful compliment! We appreciate your kind words and hope you visit us again soon so we can show you another great getaway.  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Couldn't have asked for a better experience
review: We just returned from an 11-day stay at this amazing condo resort.  It has everything one can wish in a beach vacation, i.e.,  1. very spacious clean rooms with the feel of home (the kitchen as one can choose to cook), renovated walk-in showers (loved it more than previous jacuzzis), washer, dryers, etc., 2. Everyday delicious coffee in the mornings (3 different flavored), 3. excellent pool, 4. amazing quite beach (pls note you do need to pay extra for beach lounge/umbrella rentals or bring your own), 5. quite part of FMB, 6. close to Santini Plaza with stores & restaurants - I can go on and on....  We had such a relaxing vacation that we haven't had in a very long time and we do travel a few times a year. Can't wait to return next year!!!!

title: AWESOME!
review: We stayed at this resort on a family vacation. We love going to tropical destinations in the winter to get away from the winter weather in Illinois. This resort is on our top 5 list of all places we have ever stayed. We have been to all but 8 states and have stayed in everything from roach motels to 5 star hotels and this place is one of the best. The views were awesome and the rooms were clean with great amenities. The beach was clean and manicured. Highly recommend this place!

title: Wonderful beach resort as long as you do NOT get assigned to Wuite 201!!!
review: Dear Sam T,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at Pointe Estero. We’re thrilled to hear about how much you enjoyed your stay. It means a lot to hear such great feedback from someone as well traveled as you. We appreciate your kind words and would love to have you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Beachfront stay
review: We had a wonderful stay at Pointe Estero after we requested and were moved from Suite 201.  The terrace overlooks the air conditioner units and the dryer vents from the laundry.  There was noise, heat, and lint blasting onto the terrace and was totally unacceptable.  The second day we were moved to a higher suite and the remainder of our visit was wonderful.  The grounds are lovely, the suite is excellent, the location is great, the staff is helpful.  When checking out, our bill was approximately 40% higher than the price we had been quoted.  Since it was Sunday and no staff was available to correct this error, we had no choice but to pay the inflated bill.  However, they record all of their phone calls so our reservation price quote was checked promptly the next day and…

title: Another Great Stay
review: Dear rlucas1,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. I’m so glad our team was able to relocate you to a room that better suited your needs. It sounds like you had a wonderful time at our resort. We hope you come back and see us again next time you’re in the area!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: weekend getaway
review: we have stayed at many top rated condos, including the Waldorf Astoria, but this was the nicest condo we have ever rented. The condo is huge and is beautifully furnished. It has a walk in shower with a shower head in the ceiling.  It was like being in a rain forest.  At the back of the shower is a marble bench so you can wash sitting down. The kitchen has new appliances and is well stocked.  There is also a washer and dryer. Our unit faced the ocean.  We had a balcony that surrounded our corner unit.

title: Beautiful Place, Roomy Condo
review: We stayed for 4 nights , end of August beginning of Sept and very much enjoyed our stay.  The two bedroom condo was 1300 sq ft , lots of space for us and our daughter. This felt like home to my wife, which is very rare. The hotel are privately owned condos that are part of a rental program.  We stayed in off season so the rate was OK, however this should be expensive in high season.  Beach is huge and expansive, rental chairs and umbrellas available, and only a short drive to the Fort Myers Beach strip. Anyway very very nice.

title: Spacious and beautiful place on Ft Myers Beach!
review: Great place, large 2br, 2ba condo; newly renovated master bath is greatly appointed; pool area is being renovated so it is currently closed; very comfortable place with a hospitable staff; will definitely stay here again!

title: Beach Stay on the Gulf
review: Dear AshAsh1975,  Thanks so much for taking the time to share your comments with us. We’re so happy you enjoyed our resort and would consider a second trip. We hope to welcome you back then!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: We cant get enough of PEBR
review: Hotel had a good location, mix of tavern type and medium range restaurants nearby. Grocery store close by and if you wish to party a couple of miles up the beach all the quirky fun restaurants and bars with lots of shopping. Had a good time

title: Loved this place!
review: Dear BeachComberSteve2015,  Thanks so much for the wonderful review. We’re thrilled to hear you had an exceptional time at our resort and enjoyed all the nearby restaurants and beach bars. Come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Wonderful stay at the beach
review: Wonderful stay at this hotel. Right on the beach and also had a wonderful pool. We used the BBQ grills each night. Unit is a large 2/2. Washer/dryer and a pullout couch in the living room. Wonderful for families. Unit lived up to their advertising. Large screened porches off each bedroom. Nicely equipped kitchen. Only negative would be the outdated appliances. 'But the refrigerator made lots of ice and was clean. Would definitely recommend and we would stay there again Wifi was not real good but I find that normal in hotels Also the a/c worked great.

title: Aweome 9 Day Family Vacation
review: Dear worldtraveler34222,  Thank you for staying with us at Pointe Estero and taking the time to share your comments with us. We’re so glad you had a wonderful experience at our resort and utilized some of our on property amenities, such as the barbecue grills and pool. Thanks again for sharing your feedback with us. Come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Best kept secret
review: We really enjoyed our stay at Pointe Estero. Our family included my husband and myself and our 3 kids ages 22, 16 and 15 months, so there was a large age difference in what we were looking for during our vacation. We had a great time. We stayed August 12-20 2015. We were on the 4th floor room 402. It was a 2 bedroom suite with beach front view. The suite was incredible. There was 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The living room and kitchen were very large. The room was very clean with extra sheets and blankets in the closet. We also required a crib and a highchair for the baby, which was complimentary. They also provided crib sheets if needed.  There is a dishwasher and washer and dryer in the rooms and as we needed more supplies, you just had to request them down at the office, no…

title: Great value and location
review: Dear HollyHJ1976,  Thanks so much for taking the time to leave us a detailed review. We’re so glad you and your family had such an exceptional experience at our resort. It’s wonderful that you were able to receive the full Fort Myers Beach experience, taking advantage of the water sport rentals and visiting some of our nearby attractions. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Wonderful view and room
review: Best kept secret of Fort Myers Beach. This was our second stay at the hotel we were there the week Aug12-19/2015. The room the view (gulfview) the grounds the pool and of course the beach keeps us coming back. Family of 4 (two teenagers) plenty of room to stretch out and not get in each other's way. The only issue was the on going renovations but we were well notified on the days that work was to be done so it never really interrupted our stay. Looking forward to coming back in the future and definitely booking this hotel.

title: Gulf view Penthouse
review: Just came back from a 4 night stay in the gulf view penthouse 16th floor at pointe estero.  One word HORRIBLE.  The kitchen was small, two people bump into each other, the living room was small and had outdated furniture.  The small spiral staircase going up to a loft had dirty and sticky railing.  The ledge was dusty and nasty.  One you got up there the outside rooftop patio was scary to be on.  We didn't even use it.  the pool was just ok.  If your looking for a stay in a penthouse .....definitely don't look at pointe estero.

title: All you need to know about Pointe Estero
review: Dear Sharon F,  Thank you for staying at Pointe Estero and taking the time to share your comments with us. As you can imagine, I’m very disappointed to hear that several aspects of our accommodations did not meet your expectations. Your concerns have been noted and will certainly be taken into consideration moving forward.  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Failed the test of adversity
review: Pointe Estero is at the south (quiet) end of Ft Myers Beach, closer to Lover's Key than it is to the north end of Ft Myers Beach, which has many shops/restaurants.  This hotel has 16 floors, with two bedroom condos.  The 16th floor houses a penthouse with rooftop deck.    There are 4 units per floor.  The ones facing the beach/water, end in "02" (left side facing the beach) and "04" (right side facing the beach).  The rooms ending in "01" and "03" have a different floor plan and face the parking lot/pool area.   I stayed in room 1502, which is the 15th floor, (left-side corner) facing the beach.  The view was INCREDIBLE!!!  The balcony was rounded, and was accessed through the living area or the master bedroom.  There was a second balcony off of the smaller bedroom.  On the…

title: Perfect family stay
review: Where do I start?  While on my way to check in, 15 minutes from the hotel, I received a phone call indicating the there was severe flooding in the lobby and the elevators were not in service.  After being offered a discount or ability to cancel, I was not in a position to negotiate being 1,000 miles from home and agreed to stay.  The staff could have called the day before when the flooding occurred giving us time to make a more informed decision.  All week long we endured the hum of a diesel generator, dehumidifiers and clean-up workers.  This situation was the true test of their customer service at Pointe Estero and I have to say, they failed.  When a customer is inconvenienced, an establishment should go above and beyond to make it right!  We did receive a decent refund after…

title: Would not reccomend
review: Dear JPdoc88,  Thank you for staying with us at Pointe Estero and taking the time to voice your concerns. Your feedback is extremely valuable, as we aim to improve the guest experience each and every visit. As you can well imagine, I’m very disappointed to learn of the frustrations you encountered during your recent stay. This is certainly not reflective of the high standards we demand from ourselves and I would like to apologize for any difficulties that came about during your visit.  As you can imagine, the flood was a very unfortunate occurrence for our guests. We did our best to compensate the guests by offering half rates for those wanting to stay in our resort, as well as crediting guests leaving and canceling upon arrival. Please understand that this unfortunate experience put our team under a lot of stress, and I do apologize if this was reflected through any interactions with our staff. If there is anything I can do to be of better assistance, please feel free to reach out to me.   Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Not Going Back
review: It was appalling to discover - AFTER we checked in - that bathroom renovations were going on at the resort.  We NEVER would have booked had we known and will not EVER book again b/c of the deceit.  Even the sign in the elevator alerting us to this inconvenience was a lie.  The small print said noise would happen on Monday and the large print advised us to leave our room on Tuesday from noon until 2.  Leave our room??  That was the first we heard of it – on a sign in the elevator. Well - the noise hit us on Thursday while we tried to enjoy our deck on our first day.  And then it began again first thing on Friday morning. Not much of a relaxing vacation.  I can't even imagine if I had a child who napped!! It was bad enough w/ a 20 year old who just wanted to sleep in. Then the…

title: Short getaway
review: Dear deckgirl,  Thank you for taking the time to express  your concerns. Your feedback is extremely valuable, as we always aim to improve the guest’s experience with each and every visit.  As you can well imagine, I am very disappointed to learn of the many frustrations you encountered during your recent stay. This is certainly not reflective of the high standards we demand from ourselves, and I would like to sincerely apologize for any inconveniences that came about during your visit, including the construction on the master bathrooms.    As you can imagine, the flooding caused by heavy rain was a very unfortunate occurrence, and our team did their best to compensate guests by offering discounted rates for guests who continued to stay at our resort, as well as crediting guests leaving and canceling upon arrival. Please understand that this was an unfortunate occurrence and I apologize if there were any negative interactions with our staff due to the situation. If there is anything I can do to be of better assistance, please feel free to reach out to me directly.  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Seems more like rental condos than a hotel, but excellent nonetheless
review: Stayed at Pointe Estero for 5 nights at the end of June. It was a very nice hotel/condo. We had ocean front views, from a screened in balcony, at our 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo. Nice sized living area/full kitchen. Each room with balcony access. It is really set up for family with kids. 1 master bedroom and 1 bedroom with 2 twins. My sister and I went with our 2 teenagers, but I just slept in the master-King- with my daughter, she in the Twins with her son. We each had our own bathroom, so it worked fine. Beach area clean, white sand. The ocean was a little greener than Sarasota area though. Pool area nicely done with areas of shade and sun. Everything was clean. Just a short drive to fort Myers beach for shopping and places to eat. For a hot or rainy day, a movie theater is…

title: Great place for families
review: Dear Tam K,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay. We’re so glad you enjoyed our resort and nearby attractions. Come back and visit us again soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Wonderful place to stay
review: As the title implies, this building seems more like a collection of privately owned condos that are then rented out as opposed to the traditional hotel. I might be totally mistaken, but that seems to be the case. Regardless of the exact ownership status, Pointe Estero is a wonderful place to stay. My wife booked us a suite as a gift to me and we had a wonderful beach view room high up in the tower. The suite really could be a condo given the amenities that it had and the room is well-maintained. I thoroughly enjoyed watching the sun set from the balcony if I didn't want to sit down on the sand. Pointe Estero sits further south along Fort Myers Beach and away from the madness that rules on the northern tip of the island, so I very much appreciated the peace and quiet. I'd…

title: 10 yr anniversary trip
review: We loved Pointe Estero. The room was so nice and spacious.  The view of the beach was awesome.  We slept with our shades open just to see the view. Having a washer and dryer in the room was very helpful. They even provided detergent,  dish soap, etc so we didn't have to buy our own. The facility was nicely landscaped and made a nice view while laying at the pool. We loved everything about this facility and have nothing negative to say. We can't wait to book again.

title: The WOW factor
review: Dear dstroble,  Thank you so much for the kind review, and congratulations on your 10-year anniversary! I’m so happy to hear you enjoyed every aspect of our resort, from the beach to our amenities. We can’t wait to welcome you back in the near future!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Good, but needs a little bit of love to become great
review: We booked this resort just a couple of days prior to our visit. When we arrived we knew we had made a great choice. The apartments, although needing updating, offered us everything we required, and views to die for. We were located on the eleventh floor facing onto the beach. We had two very good sized bedrooms and a sofa bed in the lounge. The master bedroom has an enormous jacuzzi bath, I understand these are to be replaced with large showers during the refurb, quite understandable with the amount of water this would use, but, saying that we did use it!  All rooms have access to balconies, which are furnished with tables and chairs. The pool area is extremely pleasant and also has a hot tub. This area is open until 10pm. Also offered are 4 large gas BBQs that are readily…

title: Good time
review: My family stayed here for 2 nights this week on a spur of the moment trip.  My wife and I had stayed at Pointe Estero Beach Resort about 10-years ago and really enjoyed ourselves.  The location is perfect and having a full suite with kitchen makes things easier.  Pointe Estero Beach Resort is located on Estero Boulevard, which is the main road running through Fort Myers Beach.  The hotel is located approximately 4.5 miles/15 minutes from Highway 865 (the access road at the North of the Island) or 8 miles/15 minutes from Bonita Springs.  There is parking immediately outside the resort; while we were there we always found several parking spaces available.  Our check-in process went smoothly.  Although the person assisting wasn't overly welcoming they were professional and…

title: Lovely property. Perfect for girls trip.
review: Dear Circusdog,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your detailed feedback on your recent stay at Pointe Estero. Your input is extremely valuable; as we aim to improve our property and guest experience on every visit. I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed several aspects of our resort. However, I apologize if the noise from the air conditioning and bed were an inconvenience during your stay. We appreciate your comments and will certainly look into these issues to ensure this is not a problem in the future.  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: GREAT!!
review: This was our first time staying at Pointe Estero Beach Resort.   We highly recommend to others.   Everything was GREAT, clean, helpful, view was beautiful, right on the beach, white sandy beach and clean.

title: Great Birthday!
review: Dear Julie B,  Thank you for staying with us at Pointe Estero and providing us with a great review. I’m glad you enjoyed your stay with us and had a wonderful experience. We appreciate your positive feedback and look forward to your next visit with us!  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: At the Pointe!
review: My husband took me here for my birthday. It was an amazing hotel. The rooms are nice, clean, spacious, and the beachfront rooms have a spectacular view. Multiple balconies, great amenities, and friendly staff. I have no complaints. The beach was beautiful and relaxing. It was quiet and private. We will be back.

title: Our Honeymoon!!!
review: Family friendly resort with a courteous staff in a quieter area of the island. Convient to Fort Myers, Naples, Bonita Beach and Sanibel area restaurants and water sports.  We've been coming here for years and have made friends every year. Guests coming from longer distances will want to book a couple months in advance.

title: GREAT VACATION!!
review: We went there on our honeymoon. We loved it so much, we extended our stay. I've emailed them back for future accommodations. Regretfully, we haven't had a response. We told all of our family and friends what a great place it was. However, it is on expensive side. Wish they would get back to us. Customer service is a necessity, the lack of return email or phone call is disappointing and not my original experience . So good luck! I guess they don't need the business!!

title: great place to relax by the gulf
review: found this place just from searching the internet, ended up being everything advertised.  Very nice room with all of the amenities.  Easy access to the beach.  Heated pool.  Close to restaurants.  We were there right before the memorial day holiday and it wasn't crowded.  Very relaxing vacation, it was great sitting on the balcony watching the gulf.  We were on the 5th floor, I think you need to be on the 5th or higher to see the gulf otherwise the palm trees may be in the way

title: Location and facility can't be beat.  A wonderful place.
review: We have visited condos, villas and hotels world wide.  Pointe Estero is very near the best we have been too.  The facility is well maintained and located on one of the best sites on this beach.  It is very quiet and an easy walk to the Gulf.   I can't think of anything that wasn't up to par.  Yes, we'll be back there again.

title: great location on fort myers beach!!
review: A very nice place. The view from the 5th floor was amazing both gulf and back views.  The beach is the nicest on Fort myers beach and close to shopping!!  You can rent a cabana for $20 a day for two seats with umbrella, very nice!!  Did not see any dolphins this trip but usually I see them.  Lots of sea life on the floor of the gulf, but please do not bring them home with you.. enjoy them take pictures but put back!!  The unit was very clean, could use a furniture upgrade but was comfortable.  Had great dinners at Flippers and parrot Key

title: Beautiful sunset views
review: Our April vacation ended much too quickly.  We truly enjoyed our 8th floor beachfront suite for our quiet R & R vacation. Even though the hotel requires some updating - particularly in the master bath (which is being updated this summer)  - they are keeping the suites in excellent condition.  Every item in our kitchen was in good working order and most utensils and dishes seemed new.  The bed was quite comfortable and the linens and towels plentiful and very clean.  We had one minor issue that maintenance took care of immediately.  The hotel staff was courteous, efficient and very helpful.  The sunsets from our lanai were breathtaking.  The beach, outstanding.  Plenty of good eating within walking distance or a short drive.  The local Publix market, also a short drive away,…

title: A pleasure to find a great hotel and customer service
review: Just great! Ira helped us at the front desk get last minute reservations...He could not have been more helpful. What a great little gem you have here, you should be proud of your hotel and staff! Quite clean and spacious, did not see one little bit of litter or garbage ANYWHERE! Thanks for a Fantastic time, visiting friends from Switzerland. Patt- Bonny Bass

title: Great Location
review: We initially  were promised a beachfront 7th floor or higher but ended up with the 4th floor beachfront. The view was very nice but we were unable to view the setting sun behind the fronds of a large palm tree. The suite was well appointed, clean and contained every basic item one might need in the kitchen. Bright and cheerful. The bath was more than adequate although somewhat dated with a gigantic bathtub/whirlpool/ shower combo that unfortunately leaked all over soaking an array of towels. Spent half an hour cleaning up that mess and drying the towels. Solved the leak temporarily and informed management. It was clear that this problem was ongoing because the wallpaper and wood trim showed some staining and the wallpaper was "curled" near the floor. Outside around the pool area…

title: Business Meeting
review: With a total of 16 guests we didn't quite know what to expect - we put two people in each condo unit; they had their own bedroom and bathroom (both ample space) and shared a nice dining room and kitchen area.  The living room was spacious and had plenty of seating.  We were amazed with the Penthouse option - we spent a lot of time on the Rooftop, entertaining and for break-out meetings. We grilled in the gazebo area and then served everything in the Penthouse; again, plenty of seating/space for all 16 of us.  The staff were extremely helpful and always happy, the units were clean and well stocked.  The view was amazing and the WOW factor can not be duplicated!  I would recommend again!

title: Fantastic
review: Excellent place to stay for out family of 5. Plenty of room, clean, quiet. A lot of necessities were provided, such as toilet paper, garbage bags, shower essentials. We were on the second floor, so the view wasn't much to speak of, but we could still see the beach. The pool and hot tub were nice, and clean. The grills were a bonus

title: Great Place, a little pricey
review: Great Venue, on the south side of the island.   Large, beautiful beach area, away from Times Square area.   The only thing lacking was a beach Tiki bar area for drinks and or entertainment, but that being said, there are two others near Pointe Estero Beach resort within walking distance.      Once you get there, it's fantastic.    However, getting there can be a challenge, especially during spring break weeks.     Our day of arrival included at least a one hour drive time to make the last 3 or 4 miles.   Traffic SUCKS.      My recommendation is to approach from the south.     Drive to Bonita Beach and drive north to the island to avoid the traffic.    It's pathetic, and I don't understand why the Police can't do a better job, or set the traffic signals to help monitor the…

title: Worth Every Penny!
review: We stayed in Unit 101. This is a 2 bedroom unit that can also be rented as a 1 bedroom. Smart floor plan. Incl: washer/dryer. Pool area was beautiful and clean. This property is right on the beach. Publix, 7-11, CVS, liquor store, shops are nearby. Quiet mid island location. Ira was very friendly /helpful at check-in.

title: Absolutely Fantastic!
review: The staff at the reception at Pointe Estero were very professional, courteous and informative but this is the USA and the Americans are renowned for their customer service skills. The condo itself was extremely spacious and well kept with a bath tub/jacuzzi that could have accommodated an entire football team and you could not want for anything. We were lucky enough to have a condo with a beach front view and it was great to sit out in the morning on the balcony eating croissants and watching the sun rise. The grounds, pool and hot tub are fantastic and again immaculately maintained, there is also a small gym within the hotel. It was lovely to leave the grounds of the hotel and immediately find yourself walking along the pure white sands of the beach. Take a walk to the top…

title: Point Estero Ft. Myers Beach, FL
review: Point Estero is a building full of beautiful condos all with a view of the beach.  The grounds, pool and rooms are gorgeous and make for a great vacation.  There is plenty of shopping in the area along with restaurants and activities.  We suggest, if you want to avoid traffic in February, go toward Bonita instead of Ft. Myers.  Lots to do either way.

title: Pointe Estero
review: If you want lots of room in condo, you have it.  We have been here many times and love the grounds but the condos are getting very shabby. Our jacuzzi had so much black mold in it and also bathroom floor.  Bed was just okay. The prices are very high so one should expect very nice accommodations. By that I mean no holes in drapes, furniture faded, chipped desk, etc. sure would be nice to replace dining room table so bottom (tree trunk) doesn't mark your legs. Time for do over Sunstream!

title: Very much of all
review: Dear bonelle3917,  Thank you for staying with us at Pointe Estero and taking the time to give us your feedback. I am pleased to hear that you are returning guests and have enjoyed our beautiful location many times. However, I am concerned that our accommodations did not meet your expectations. Please note that we are in the process of completing extensive upgrades to our bathrooms. Once again, we appreciate your feedback, as this will assist us as we move forward and continue to make improvements to our property. We thank you for your support and hope you to see you on a future visit.  Sincerely, Randy Kares – General Manager

title: Very Nice Place to Stay
review: This hotel with apartments has most of it all. Beautiful wide beach, nice pool area and large apartments with balcony. A bit too far away from where it happens, but actually not much happens on the island. You will probably need a car to get you anywhere else. If you don't need all the space you can rent the apartment with one room locked.

title: Went there two years ago and came back this year. On the beach. Walking distance to restaurants.
review: Nice pool. Helpful front desk. Great spot on white sand beach. South end of the island. Not as congested. Two miles to Publix grocery store. Marina on Bay side .3 mile short walk to bar, two restaurants ice cream shop, Subway sandwich store and boat rental.

title: Wonderful Property
review: We were looking for a 2 bedroom condo with 2 twin beds in the 2nd bedroom. This is almost impossible to find, but this is what is available at Pointe Estero. It worked out great for us and our two 20 something children. This is a good location because it is far from the heavy traffic up near Times Square and it is within walking distance to Santini Plaza which has shopping and several nice restaurants. The staff were wonderful and everything was great. Try to rent a 02 or 04 unit with the direct view of the beach front. The wifi was free and easy to use both in the rooms and at the pool.We plan to return next year.

title: Beautiful property but
review: This property is first class and the ocean views are amazing and the beach is outstanding. It also has a very nice pool and hot tub.  But, paying this much money I would have never thought that there would be no housekeeping included, no room service available, and no on site food whatsoever. (so you can't call it a resort if you ask me) This is why I rank them average, if you pay this much money for an nice hotel room, you would think you would get some type of light housekeeping at least. If your looking at staying here for an extended period, then this is the place for you. It has a full kitchen but ours was a little light on tools. IE: no frying pan and no spatula.  Beautiful property, but wish we had light housekeeping included. Who feels like washing your own towels on…

title: Outstanding location, service, ambiance
review: We stayed here for one week December/January 2015. Had wonderful experience. Rooms very clean, fully equipped kitchen with top notch products. Will certainly return and recommend to family and friends. All service personnel were very professional, friendly and  accommodating.

title: Sold Out but Never Felt Crowded!
review: Our family of 10 from different regions of the country met here for Christmas.  This property is perfect for families to gather!  The resort was Sold Out, but the property is so vast, that we sometimes felt like we were the only occupants--perfect for relaxation and peace!  The sand on the beach is the softest, whitest we have ever seen.  We were a little disappointed in the Fort Myers water color--not sure what we were expecting.  The units were very very clean and in good working order.  The staff was very attentive to every need.  Shout out to Kraig!  The resort location can be inconvenient during a busy tourist season, as it took us 45 minutes to travel 3.9 miles to our dinner destination (near Times Square).  If we did not have elderly parents with us, we would have biked…

title: Great Location
review: We stayed for only two nights in early December.  We were in a pent house unit which was really nice.  We did have a great view of the beach/ocean and really enjoyed it.  The unit is a little worn.  The master bath is very different - a large Jacuzzi tub with a shower out of one wall.  No shower curtain or enclosure.  Someone not agile might have a hard time getting in and out.  The smaller bathroom had a standard tub and shower.  We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay on a future visit.  The staff was very friendly.

title: Top Notch , pure relaxation , worth every penny .
review: Well Dad is proud and Mom was impressed and daughter doesn't wanna go home ! This resort is by far the best on Fort Myers beach . Full kitchen , whirlpool tub and 2 showers panoramic view of the ocean . Flat screen TVs , screened in porches , beach out the back door . Oleg the manager and the all front desk staff were class acts . No funny issues like extra charges or anything . Wireless internet for free . Clean comfortable beds even have a pull out that is memory foam . Plenty of towels . In room washer and dryer as well as vacum and broom . Nothing was left out . Quiet peaceful end of beach . Book the ocean view for a few more bucks well worth it . We will be back year after year . Have been to other places in FL this takes the cake . Dont wanna leave . Looking out the…

title: Nice Hotel but far away from anything except the beach
review: We stayed here and enjoyed the place, it was nice and clean.  The hard part is it a hike to get to any night life at all.  The pool was a little cold but that is what the hot tub is for.  The only thing to make it better would be a swim up bar that you could bill drinks to your room.  The grounds were nice and lots of golf courses in the area. Make sure to eat at Flippers one night when you are there you wont regret it.

title: you get what you pay for
review: The saying "you get what you pay for" is very true when it comes to staying at Pointe Estero Beach Resort!  Folks may be taken back by the pricing but I want to tell you that it is worth it.  The place is first class starting with the appearance of the grounds, continuing to the clean comfortable rooms, the warm and friendly staff, and the LOCATION!!!  If you can afford it stay here!!!!!

title: Beachfront
review: Lovely place to stay, though some things are a little dated.  Coffee is served every morning, which is a nice touch.  The premises are kept very tidy and clean.  The only drawback was the fact that smoking is allowed on the balconies, which tends to drift up.

title: AWESOME!!!!!
review: WOW; this place is great. The place, the staff, everything. we highly recommend it. the resort gave us a free upgrade to penthouse condo. this is the best vacation i have ever had, and the best place i have ever stayed.

title: 6th Time in 3 Years
review: We've been vacationing in FMB for 5 years now and the last 3 years (2 stays/year) have been at Pointe Estero.  I've read some of the other reviews and agree that the furnishings are becoming old and dated but did notice, in the lobby, the plans for updating in 2015; the master bath with a large tiled shower replacing the huge spa.  We cooked in more than normal on this trip and did notice the oven was on it's last legs due to age/use. We stayed in 1502, beachfront...a million $ view. All-in-all, we enjoy Pointe Estero and may come back in the future but it appears we'll be travelling to other locales to explore.   Keep up the good work, your resort has provided lasting memories.

title: Wow!!
review: Having never been to the area, I reserved this hotel based off of trip adviser reviews. We could not be happier with our room, view, and service received!   When I booked, I was told we would have a gulf view room with a guaranteed high floor. What we got: an ocean front penthouse!!! Views were PHENOMINAL!!  Though we were in the are for a wedding, relaxation was a second goal. This was more than accomplished with views from the roof top and walks On the beach.  Though this was an adult only trip, this place would suite families with kids. Rooms were spacious, well equipped and comfortable. Like previous reviews, decor is a tad outdated, however, it was all,in working order. We had a slight issue with sewer gas issues making the master bath more than 'fragrant' at times. Seeing…

title: Fantastic!
review: Dear Mpwill, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort on beautiful Fort Myers Beach. I'm excited to hear that you had a wonderful experience in the area and we hope the wedding was beautiful as well. I'm also happy to hear you enjoyed your large suite with stunning Gulf views. There's nothing like waking up in the morning and gazing out over the white sand and calm Gulf water. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Overpriced, needs refurbishment, service basic
review: We stayed at Pointe Estero for a long weekend.  We found the grounds to be beautiful and the pool and hot tub were fabulous.  We did run into some issues with our room and worked with Kraig for them mostly.  I must say, what an asset to your company!  He checked us in efficiently and handled our room issues with concern and courtesy.  Our trip could have went another direction if it wasn't for Kraig and Ira's customer service.  The rooms are very large, however some aspects are outdated and straight up odd (shower coming out of the wall into a Jacuzzi tub!).  The rooms were what I would call clean enough, but not CLEAN which surprised me.  What made up for that was the location and view!!  I said thank you a million times to Kraig, but I'll say it again.  THANK YOU KRAIG!  Your…

title: Business and Pleasure
review: Pointe Estero was extremely helpful with a Business / Pleasure trip I had. I was coming in after hours, they helped us get settled after a long Journey. Very comforting experience. Possibly, the best rooms I have ever seen. Everyone friendly, everything clean, pool and Jacuzzi were extremely clean. Highly recommend to anyone. Stay here with confidence.

title: Quiet and great balconies!
review: Dear Carl A, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Fort Myers Beach. I'm pleased to hear that you enjoyed your fully equipped suite and glad we were able to make you feel comfortable and relaxed after your travels. Our goal is to always exceed your expectations at every opportunity. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Clean with all the amenities
review: We had a two bedroom suite that had two balconies.  Both balconies looked out at the water.  The decor is definitely outdated but the room served its purpose.  One good thing about older hotels is space is great!  Our living room area and kitchen were great having kids!  Many hotels today give up space for beauty!  You walk out your hotel onto the beach.  What I didn't realize is We were pretty far from the central Ft Myers beach area is which I liked!  This area was quiet and very family friendly.  We could drive down to the hustle and bustle or just stay on our quiet beach area. They have movies to rent at the front desk for a dollar.  Oh and we ate breakfast on our balcony every morning.  There is a table!  My favorite part in the morning!  We also were able to watch the…

title: Excellent Stay
review: Dear NikeChula, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort on beautiful Fort Myers Beach. Nothing pleases me more than knowing we were able to give you a fantastic experience. We continually strive to give our guests a truly special stay. Our large suites certainly give you that home away from home feeling and I'm glad you and your family enjoyed the space. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Beyond our expectations!!!!
review: This was our first time at Pointe Estero Resort. We arrived very late, however, that was no trouble for the more than competent staff. Everything was ready just as they said it would be. The unit we had was extremely large with spectacular ocean views. From the ground music at the pool to the abundant Weber grills, My wife and I knew we picked the perfect spot to celebrate our 25th Anniversary. Hope to make this resort an annual anniversary trip.

title: Perfect Peace
review: I'll start this review by saying that the hotel and grounds were extremely clean, quiet and provided a very relaxing experience.  We stayed on the left side of the hotel (facing ocean) with an ocean view room.  The room was booked through Groupon and in our opinion, was a great deal considering the quality of the hotel and size of the room.  Our stay was from 10/9-10/14.  The room had a full kitchen and cooking utensils, coffee, paper towel, dish soap, laundry detergent, etc was provided.  Beach towels were in the bathroom vanity cabinet.   The king size bed was very comfortable.  The room had a wrap-around balcony that was screened-in so we didn't have to deal with bugs.  It was perfect for morning coffee and meals throughout the day.  The pool area was nice, as was the hot…

title: Three day weekend in paradise
review: Dear Wildcattom1, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort on Fort Myers Beach. I'm extremely pleased to hear that you had a great time at our property and found our large suites to be comfortable and well equipped. We truly strive to give all our guests that home away from home feeling. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: We love it here!
review: This was our first time at this property but it won't be our last. From the moment we walked in and were greeted by Angelina to the moment we left couldn't have been more perfect. The unit we had was wonderful with spectacular views. The management was able to accommodate my request for earlycheck in and went out of there way to make our stay wonderful. The unit 704 had everything you could want. The resort was quiet and had comfortable beds for sleeping.

title: Perfect as usual!
review: Dear Judith, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. Nothing pleases me more than knowing we were able to give you a fantastic experience. Our goal is to exceed your expectations at every opportunity. I'll be sure to pass along your kind words to our staff, I know they will greatly appreciate it. Thank you again for staying with us and we are already looking forward to serving you again soon.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: One of the best stays ever!
review: This was our second time her and we live it. The staff is always friendly and welcoming and you hate to leave. It's right on the beach. Get a room as high as possible so your view I'd above the tree line. Minimum 6th floor. All rooms have a view and a full kitchen.This year you can pay for a small canvas so your child can paint singing that the hotel will put up as part of the decor. Small tip, when you barbecue outdoors, make sure you have one of those bug repellants so you don't get bitten.

title: Vacation in September 2014
review: I actually won this trip from Facebook!  I had won 5 nights accommodation in a 1 bedroom condo with a gulf view as well as round trip air fare from my home city!  I decided to contact the hotel and arrange to stay for 2 extra nights to coincide with my gateway city air fare.  We were able to do this with them no problem and they did give us a nice rate!  All the rooms have a view of the gulf.  Our was on the 10th floor.  Beautiful set up!  We had been given a 2 bedroom unit with the 2nd bedroom locked but they would unlock if we needed.  We didn`t need to but what that did was give us a 2nd bathroom and laundry which was much appreciated!  We had a huge master bedrrom with a king sized bed and flat screen t.v. The master bath was also very large with a super sized jacuzzi  tub…

title: Widest Beach Ever
review: Dear Dyzana, Thank you very much for taking the time to give us such a wonderful review. I'm very excited to hear you had a fantastic experience and enjoyed your large suite with a Gulf view balcony. We want you to feel completely comfortable and relaxed during your stay as well as giving you that home away from home feeling. I'm also pleased to hear our staff did a great job of taking care of you, we strive to exceed your expectations at every opportunity. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Wonderful Experience!
review: I am always a little uneasy when going to a new place but never been disappointed since I check trip adviser first.   This beach resort was a wonderful choice with it's very spacious rooms and totally awesome wide beach.   Spend the extra money and get a beachfront room....worth every cent.   The wrap around deck is wonderful and they made sure we had everything we needed.  This place definitely deserves to be at the top of the list when looking for accommodations on Fort Myers Beach.

title: A hotel with two distinct personalities....
review: Dear Mtteach52, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us on beautiful Fort Myers Beach. Yes, the beach at our location is the widest on the island. There's plenty of room for beach activities, exploring and relaxing. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your beach front suite with large wrap-around balcony. We really do try to exceed the expectations of all our guests. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Didn't want to leave
review: By far, this was one of the best resorts we have encountered.  The staff was superb and the location was excellent.  Two bedroom two bath condo including full kitchen, Jacuzzi tub, 3 TVs, view of the beach and intercostal waterway.  Take advantage of this location if you have the chance.

title: Excellent weekend
review: Totally satisfied, from checking in untill checkout.  Rooms very clean,  pool and property area clean. I didn't go to the beach so I can't give an opinion,  we were a party of four and we will go back soon. Highly recommended.

title: "Fort Myers Beach at it's best"
review: Dear Frankv51, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort on beautiful Fort Myers Beach. I'm pleased to hear that your party of four had a fantastic experience and loved the rooms. We really do try to make all our guests feel as if they are at their home away from home. Next time you'll have to spend some time on the beach, people love the soft white sand and the calm Gulf waters. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Pointe Estero
review: We had a beach front 2 bedroom suite. I brought my parents along with my wife and daughter. The first impression from them was wow. We were on the 5th floor and had a great view of the beach and the Gulf of Mexico. Sunsets were great! Rooms were very spacious! The whole experience was great except that we only stayed for 2 nights. I will definitely be going back to this Hotel on my next visit to beautiful Fort Myers Beach!

title: Perfect
review: Dear Juano1963, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm excited to hear that you and your family had a fantastic time. Our large suites do make it possible for families to all stay under one roof. Fort Myers Beach is famous for its sunsets and I'm glad you were able to enjoy a couple of them from your balcony. Thank you again and we hope you are able to stay longer during your next visit.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Beautiful views, friendly service.
review: My husband and I were celebrating our 21st wedding anniversary.  We have stayed on this property before (in fact, we were upgraded to the Penthouse on our previous visit)!!! Very nice.  The cleanliness of the entire property, the amenities in the room from the fully-equipped kitchen,the washer & dryer, to the beach towels was above and beyond. We would definitely stay here again.

title: Relax and enjoy
review: My husband our two daughters and I stayed at Point Estero this past July.  Upon arrival we were told our room was on the first floor.  We had requested a room higher up but there were none available, we were told we could check the next day if we wanted a different room.  We went to the room, which actually was on the floor above the reception area.  The room was beautiful, clean and very comfortable.  We decided we liked it, and settled in.  It actually turned out great, being on the first level we did not have to wait on the elevator to get where we wanted to go.  I did talk to the desk about having requested a room higher up and they explained how the system works, with owners coming and going, they can only do their best.  That being said, as much as we would like the same…

title: Just booked our trip and can't wait!!!
review: Dear Familyfungirl4, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm pleased to hear that you and your family had a fantastic time. I do apologize that we couldn't put you on a higher floor but am glad it worked out for the better. I'm happy that you enjoyed your large suite, we really do try to make all our guests feel as if they are at their home away from home when staying with us. Also, we are always in the process of upgrading our property and do have some nice changes scheduled soon. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Relax on Ft Myers Beach in style
review: This is out 3rd time at a Sunstream resort.  Pointe Estero this will be our 2nd time there as we had stayed at the Gulwing once as well.  It was the most perfect vacation.  Gulwing was also a nice hotel but myself and my boyfriend both agreed we really liked the Pointe Estero Resort better.  They have eveything you coud possibly need.  Full kitchen, BBQ grills on site, a beautiful view.  It's just paradise.  Everyone that works there is just so nice.  They are so helpful and just want you to have a great time. We are big into just hanging at the hotel and the beach and going out for nice dinners and maybe a night of some drinking and fun so this place is literally perfect for that.  We bring beach chairs, and umbrella, wine and drinks, and we hit the supermarket and go food…

title: Great condo!
review: Dear DLF1414, Thank you very much for coming to stay with us again at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. Nothing makes me happier than knowing we can continue to give you a fantastic experience. We really do strive to exceed your expectations at every opportunity. Your happiness is our number one goal. Thank you again for all your kind words, we are looking forward to giving you another wonderful SunStream vacation.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: OK, but not more
review: Point Estero Resort is outstanding. Comfortable, clean condos right on the beach. Pool, gazebo and grills for your convenience. Beach is awesome. Clean white, soft sand, rent beach chairs or bring your own. Don't take any live shells, look at them and throw them back, protect the area. Grocery store down the street, plenty of great restaurants. Enjoy going, very relaxing.

title: A MUST STAY
review: This was our 2nd visit, and it was like returning home, with a warm welcome. The staff were wonderful, friendly and always ready to help. The suite is a roomy 1 bedroom 2 bath,with a huge balcony with a view of the gulf.

title: Perfect Fit for our Family
review: Dear Carolyn d, Thank you very much for staying with us again at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. Nothing makes me happier than knowing we can continue to give you a great experience stay after stay. We strive to make all our guests feel as if they are at their home away from home and I'm glad we could do that for you. Thank you again and we are looking forward to seeing you back soon.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Beautiful
review: We found this resort through a Google search and we could not be happier with our choice to stay here. It is a beautiful place and truly everything it was advertised to be. There was ample room for our family of five and it really had the comfortable feel of a self contained condo. The staff was cordial, very knowledgeable and available, yet non-intrusive and let us enjoy the resort on our pace.  Each and every request we had was handled immediately and professionally. I would not hesitate to stay here again.

title: Off Season Stay Wonderful!
review: Dear Jim_60Elky, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort on beautiful Fort Myers Beach. I'm very happy to hear that you and your family had a great experience and were able to feel at home in your large suite. We really do try to make all our guests feel as if they are at their home away from home when staying with us. I'm also happy to hear that our staff did a great job of taking care of you. Your happiness is our top priority. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: We'll surely be back!
review: We stayed in room 504 which is a 2 bedroom suite. 2 bathrooms both have bathtub and shower. The master bathtub is giant!  The kids had a blast "swimming" in the tub at night. It was easier to get them back to the room at night when I promised one last swim before bed! Housekeeping services are extra if needed, but honestly, I really didn't need or want them coming in there. There is a dishwasher, washing machine, dryer in the units. So very helpful.  The staff everywhere we went was so friendly and interacted with the kids.  They had beach and pool toys to borrow, beach chairs to borrow. Also you could borrow games and DVDs for rainy times too.  I never heard any noise from other rooms or the hallway.  View is spectacular to the beach especially at sunset.  Our favorite place…

title: Love it Every Time!
review: We have stayed at this Resort multiple times and make it a to-do at minimum once yearly. The location is excellent, the service is great, it is beautiful, the rooms are spacious and it is always a wonderful time.

title: Outstanding!
review: Dear GreatNotion24, Thank you very much for staying with us over the years. Nothing makes us happier than being able to give you a great experience stay after stay. Thank you again and we are happy to be a home away from home for you.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Best Resort at Pointe Estero
review: Right on the beach with beautiful views from every room.  We stayed only 2 nights which was a mistake...we definitely needed more time at this resort!  The grounds are lovely and the views from the suite breathtaking.  (and we were only on the 5th floor!) Clean, comfortable and very nice decor.  The pool and surrounding area was very relaxing.  Melissa at Guest Services was a wealth of knowledge and you could tell she really loves her job.  Had a wonderful time and will highly recommend Pointe Estero to friends and family.

title: Another very good stay
review: Dear Lakefly53, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm excited to hear you had a wonderful experience with us and we wish you could have stayed longer as well. There's so much to do and see on Fort Myers Beach. I'm also pleased to hear that Melissa did a great job of making your stay even better. Our staff truly does strive to give each guest a special experience. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Fanastic location
review: This was our second visit to this resort. Still a fantastic place. Quite possibly the best beach view of any of the near-by resorts. Our suite was on the front side of the resort, with a fantastic view of the beach from our patio, and another beautiful view of the canals and bay from the kitchen and bathroom. Patio access from the great room and both bed rooms. Clean, comfortable accommodations that are reasonably priced while convenient to shopping and dining.

title: Recommend as place to stay
review: I know several people who have stayed at Point Estero for years.  Reading the past reviews,  it looks like there are many who make this a regular stop for Fort Myers Beach.  Now that I've stayed, I would agree.  The condos are well built and well furnished with needed items.  The grounds are lovely, the pool is relaxing and the staff is helpful.  I especially like the way the building is designed to give all rooms a beach view, even if you are not beach front.  The kitchen had all the items we needed to cook in occasionally.  The washer and dryer were a big plus.  I could have brought far fewer clothing items than I did since I could wash as much as I needed. A few updates to the condos are needed, but I see those are in the works.  The baths will be updated this year and…

title: Great view - clean but a little dated
review: Dear Mspexplorer, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm excited to hear that your first stay with us was a very pleasurable experience. We truly do strive to make all our guests feel as if they are at their home away from home. Yes, we are always in the process of improving our property, exceeding your expectations year after year is our number one goal. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Excellent Resort
review: Just returned home after a 9 day stay at the pointe Estero Beach Resort.  Views were great and we had the ocean view not even oceanfront.  The condo comes well equipped with what we needed for our stay in terms of dishes, pots, towels,  utensils etc. The fixtures were a bit dated like our kitchen faucet was white and had caulking on parts of it, the vegetable sprayer didn't work at all but that really isn't a big deal but that whole fixture set needs to be replaced along with the bathroom set in our second bathroom.  We used the patio and community bbqs almost every night. They have four Weber bbqs and they are terrific.  The pool area was clean and never packed do getting space was easy.  The Beach is Gorgeous!! 200 feet of frontage and miles of walking. Watched pelicans daily…

title: Family Vacation
review: Dear Sarah F, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm pleased to know that you had a fantastic experience and enjoyed the beautiful beach and grounds. We love to exceed expectations at every opportunity and give our guests special memories. Thank you for letting me know about some of the things that need updating, we are always in the process of improving our property and I'll be looking into your suggestions. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: worth every penny
review: My family and I stayed at the Pointe Estero Beach Resort from April 30-May 7. The resort was very nice and the staff were really friendly. We went to downtown Fort Myers and it was wonderful and the music was great. Can't wait until we stay here again.

title: family vacation
review: condo facility is perfect location for families, it is located at quiet end of ft. myers beach and beach is over 200 yards wide.  pool area and beach which offers cabanas and beach chairs is perfect spot.  all the staff at the facility are extremely helpful and friendly. i recommend paying the extra amount and getting an ocean view condo.

title: Fantastic Resort
