review: Dear Rich M, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed our wide white sand beach, it is the widest stretch of sand on the island! Our staff always receives high praise and we are very proud of them. They really do strive to give each guest a memorable experience. Thank you again and we are looking forward to seeing you back soon.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Needs upgrading but Those are Coming!
review: It was a great experience to stay at this hotel. We had a two bedroom apartment with Beach front. The apartment was bigger than our home. The staff was very helpfull. Location was also great. We'll hope to come back.

title: Excellent customer service , but traffic can be frustrating
review: Dear Dorte B, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm glad our staff was able to take great care of you and that you enjoyed our beach front location on south Fort Myers Beach. We really do try to make our guests feel as if they are at their home away from home, only on the beach! Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you back in the future.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Fantastic location and first rate customer service!!
review: Pointe Estero had always been one of our favorite places to stay when we are in South Florida. Thus we have been  frequent visitors to this place for years.  This time, however, we were not satisfied with our accommodations!  Our two bedroom beachfront condo was definitely in disrepair and we even wondered if the condo unit (second floor) had an owner besides the Sunstream chain.  Both bathrooms needed major upgrades, as the floors and tile were bad, tubs looked rough, outdated sinks, lights, and the faucets should be replaced.  In addition, some of the carpet in the guest bedroom needed spot treating, and the carpeting in the lobby/elevator areas were wearing thin.  However, without complaining or even bring these items up, (we are not complainers), we were told upon checking…

title: Pleasant Visit
review: We stayed there and had a very nice experience.  The property in beautiful with a nice beach. Everyone we dealt with was very nice. The location is out of the most congested part of Ft. Meyers Beach.  It is a nice quiet area.

title: Fanastic
review: Dear Barry M,  Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm very pleased to hear you had a nice experience and enjoyed the wonderful beach. Yes, we are located on the quiet south end of the island, yet still close to many great restaurants. It's the perfect place to be during our busy winter season. Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope to see you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Very nice, but next door is better
review: We loved it. We will return. In fact we'd love to return around this coming Christmas. Keep up the good work you and your staff do. It was getting up in the morning and sit on the baloney, drinking coffee and reading the paper. Larry Lanphere Luverne, Mn

title: 5th Time in 2-1/2 Years
review: Dear 443Jane330, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. There's nothing like waking up in the morning with a cup of coffee and watching the beach from the large balconies. I'm excited to hear you had a great time and we do hope to see you back around Christmas. Thank you again.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Excellent hotel
review: First stay here. Very nice property. Room decor getting a little dated. Pool was very nice. Had some issues with the AC and it was fixed within 2 hours. I would stay again-but I believe the property next door is a little nicer and is owned by the same company.

title: Pointe Estero Beach Resort, Ft. Myers Beach, Florida
review: Beautiful grounds, clean quiet room with stunning ocean front view right on the beautiful white sand warm Gulf beach.  It was a tropical paradise. Can't wait to go back there.  Quality ritzy place to vacation in the warm Florida sun.

title: Great return visit
review: Dear Phillip U, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm excited to hear you had a great time and loved your spacious room with expanding views of the Gulf. Giving our guests a perfect beach vacation is what we love to do and I'm happy we could provide that for you. Your happiness is our number one goal. Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Gertie 27
review: This was my second year to spend 2 weeks at this wonderful place with three friends. Check-in was amazingly simple, especially since our arrival had been delayed by two days. All staff members that we encountered were friendly, polite, and willing to be of any assistance.  The rooms are clean and spacious and provide everything that's needed for a pleasant visit. The views from the balconies are amazing and offer great sunsets.  The pool is lovely, warm and clean, and the beach is a real delight. Two of the special little extras that we particularly enjoyed are the fresh coffee provided in the lobby each morning and the newspaper delivered to our door daily. We loved our time spent in this condo and look forward to returning again next year.

title: A Relaxing Retreat
review: Dear GiniBMichigan, Thank you very much for staying with us again and I'm excited to hear you enjoyed your two week stay. Nothing makes me happier than hearing that we were able to give our guests a fantastic experience stay after stay. I'm also happy to hear our entire staff was able to take great care of you, we truly do strive to give each guest a special experience. Thank you again and we are already looking forward to seeing you back next year.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Never knew....
review: Amazing room!! The location is on the quieter part of the beach but it is beautiful. Dining was within walking distance. The hotel does not have a restaurant. The view was great and the beach is wonderful, little farther walk to get to the water but worth it.

title: Nice but overpriced
review: This was our second year here and it was nice but not great.We originally chose the property for the location. When we checked in the first thing they told us was about all the up grades that had been made new mattress, patio furniture and tv. We get the two bedroom suite beach front and the view is great and the furnishings are ok. The washer and dryer worked but they shake and sound like are going to take off. The kitchen is about the same, things you need but the quality is not the best so don't try to cook anything to complicated the pans are low quality and the exhaust fan is useless. The furnishings in general are tired and used up and the tv's are old not hd so if you want to watch news in morning or something after dark you will need to tolerate fuzzy poor quality. Then…

title: Super Beachfront Resort with GREAT Ocean View
review: Dear Novaks2014, Thank you very much for staying with us again and for taking the time to give us your feedback. We are always in the process of upgrading our resort and giving our guests the best possible service and amenities, your happiness is our number one priority. I do apologize for the water leak in the closet, I trust our maintenance team was able to correct that situation for you. We will use your feedback and hopefully be able to improve for your next visit. Thank you again.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares - General Manager

title: A wonderful location for a break
review: Pointe Estero was well maintained, quiet, comfortable, well equipped, and located right on the Gulf coast beach.  The pool and hot tub were clean and comfortable with needed shade areas to keep from sunburn.  The grill and picnic area was well kept and easily accessible.  Nice tennis court and the beach was beautiful.  The unit furnishings were up to date and comfortable, nothing missing.  Love the washer & dryer in the unit, can't stand taking home dirty laundry in the suitcase.  Can't say enough and can't wait for our next visit. I don't believe that you could be disappointed.  We highly recommend Pointe Estero.

title: Enjoy the beach!
review: Dear BushB5, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm pleased to hear you had a wonderful time and enjoyed your fully equipped suite. Our guests love the fact the rooms come with a washer and dryer, it's just one more reason why we have so many repeat guests year after year. We truly want you to feel as if you're at your home away from home. Thank you again for staying with us and we are looking forward to seeing you back soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Premium accommodations but overpriced
review: We stayed in a 1 bedroom unit that had views of both the ocean and the bay to the west; the location was spectacular, our unit was immaculate and the kitchen was very well outfitted. I am familiar with rental properties that carry a minimum of china and flatware; you could have baked with what this kitchen was equipped with. Patio furniture and downstairs grill alllowed us to have a delightful sunset dinner for six with hamburgers fresh off the grill, Location right on the beach is wonderful, not at all busy, and walking distance from the property are shops and eateries. While not the cheapest stay possible in that area, the quality of the unit and the staff made the price worthwhile to us.

title: A true gem in paradise
review: An absolute wonderful place to stay at. We stayed here for 10 days and it was a great get away. Excellent facilities, clean, beautiful. Great location right at the beach. Nice and large pool for kids, good area with several grills for BBQ, close to shopping centers but far away to offer seclusion and quiet peace. The beach outside is truly amazing with powdery white sand. Enjoyed many early morning walks and jogs a long the beach front. Great amenities and the living apartments feel luxurious and fresh. Full size kitchen with all necessary utilities makes it easy to cook if you wish. This place makes dreams come true and your vacation just as special as you dream for.

title: Great unexpected trip <3
review: Dear 393Desiree, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm excited to hear you had a great experience. With our large multiple bedroom suites and fully stocked kitchens, we try to make you feel as if you are at your home away from home, only on the beach. Your comfort and happiness is our number one priority. Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you back in the future.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Great place to stay, great beach, wonderful resort
review: My husbands family owns a condo right next door, but we wanted to stay somewhere where we didn't have to clean up.  Also, we were just getting engaged and I didn't want to step on anyones feet and look bad ;)  This place is such an amazing place and holds a special place in my heart.  I was super upset my husband didn't book the diamond head resort (which is owned by the same resort company as pointe estero).  I was disappointed we didn't have a swim up bar, which was a stupid complaint.  My husband purposed to me right on the beach which was so breath taking.  We got upgraded to an Oceanfront room because they weren't into the peak season which was super nice of them.  If we ever have to stay in Fort Myers Beach Florida again and are not able to use the condo.  We will be…

title: Awesome place to stay!!
review: Dear Nicole S, Thank you so much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Resort and we are honored to be a part of your special day. We strive to give each guest a special experience and I'm glad we could do that for you. Nothing makes us happier than making you happy. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: great three day getaway
review: The rooms are large and well furnished.  We had 3 adults and a 3 year old and had plenty of room.  The master bedroom and bathroom are amazing.  The beach is large and runs for miles.  The trolley is cheap and is an easy way to get around the island. The kitchen is also well equipped with lots of cupboards and a large refrigerator.  Great pool and beach towels are provided.  Wireless internet is free and there is cable TV in all rooms. Great restaurants and a supermarket are nearby.  Really nice library on island, too.  Would definitely stay here again.

title: nice place, at least out of season
review: Stayed for a week, start of December. This was my 1st experience with renting this kind of property, and I liked it. Basically, you get a nice apartment for a price of one hotel room. It is not serviced by hotel personnel unless you pay extra, but you get much more space: 2 big rooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and laundry room and a spacious balcony wit a bay view. There are plenty of towels (including beach towels). There is a supermarket nearby and CVS across the road. I think the place is very convenient for families: gives the flexibility to have meals at home or go out. The hotel is right at the nice beach. The only drawback I can think of: the swimming pool is not big. We were there in a lull time and were able to comfortably use it, as well as the outside…

title: Can't Imagine We'd Stay Anywhere Else in Ft Myers Bch
review: Dear Jana004, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm happy we could give you a great first experience. Our large rooms and full kitchens do make it a great option for family and those looking to relax with a lot of in-room amenities. Even during peek season we have plenty of room for guests around the pool, because we only have 4 rooms per floor our property is never overwhelmed. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: A lucky find.
review: We stayed in a 2 bd/2 ba condo over the Thanksgiving weekend.  The price was very reasonable for everything that was included.  Our condo was immaculate with enough starter supplies to last us for the three nights we were there.  Loved sitting on the deck with a cocktail and looking at the gulf. Yes, the shower is a little funky, but the huge tub makes up for it.  I am a wicked towel snob and the towels were excellent.  Even my husband commented on it. When we got there, the air conditioning was broken, but the weather was so pleasant, we didn't want to say anything.  Well, somehow, the front desk knew and sent someone up to fix it.  I've never been to a hotel where something got fixed without me having to report it first.  Outstanding customer service from every department. A…

title: our "go to"
review: Dear BarbnJohn, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us. I'm excited to hear you had a wonderful experience on property. We try to make all our guests feel as if they are at their home away from home when staying with us. I'm glad we could give you that feeling. Yes, traffic towards the north end of the island can be congested at times. That's why we like our quiet south side! Thank you again and we do hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Amazing luxury
review: This was our first stay based on reviews here. It exceeded our expectations. It was exactly what we were looking for.    This is a comparatively smaller resort, 4 rooms per floor, which made it nice. We had a beachfront room, #1202, with fantastic views. There are 2 beachfront and 2 gulf view rooms per floor.   Furn.& Fixtures: The décor is probably at least 25 years old but clean and serviceable. I agree with some of the comments about the overuse of mirrors, it's a little creepy. I'm sure it was stylish back in the day. No biggie. The master bath could also benefit from a more traditional layout with shower and separate tub instead of the Olympic sized spa. :)   The grounds are beautiful with a free form pool which has some shade for a fair skinned person like myself. There…

title: Nice condo
review: The space is nice, well appointed, but dated.  We were in the smaller suite and the beds in the second bedroom are tiny.  The beach here is huge and the sand is soft.  We had a great stay and will return.

title: A great find if you can get it
review: Dear FredF09, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your spacious suite and our large beach. Thank you for taking the time to give us your review, all guest feedback is extremely valuable as it helps us to improve our property and services. Please do come back and see us in the future.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Loved it.
review: Pointe Estero in Fort Meyers Beach is really a block of high quality condominiums but, seeing a ‘vacancy’ sign at the Entrance, we ventured in to Reception to find that some of the condos were available for ‘walk-ins’. The room allocated to us included 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one with a small swimming pool of a spa bath) and a spacious lounge and kitchen with 2 balconies. We decided to extend our stay to 3 nights and very much enjoyed our time there. The adjacent beach was superb, there was a heated pool and Jacuzzi, the Reception staff were very helpful and, in essence, the rooms were luxurious; moreover, the price was remarkably reasonable despite there being no restaurant/bar facility. Specially Recommended.

title: Great Experience
review: Dear JandJFarnhamCommon, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm glad you found us and then decided to extend your stay! We strive to exceed guest expectations and give everyone a wonderful Fort Myers Beach vacation. I'm happy to hear you found the room to be spacious and our staff friendly. Our goal is to give each guest a special experience when staying with us. Thank you again and do please come back and see us soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Best place to stay on the island
review: Will definitely stay there again.  Screened in porch so we slept with the door open to hear the roar of the ocean.  Convenient, quiet, peeps were friendly, large rooms, desk clerk very knowledgeable and helpful...  Can't say enough great things.  Don't miss Heavenly Biscuit on Mango Street for breakfast. Our teens rode the trolley to the pier to the trinket shops. Grilled burgers by the pool cause kids were tired of eating out.  The units are owned by people and rented out so they are nicer than a hotel.

title: Luxurious accommodations
review: We didn't stay here but spent a full  day there with friends and explored the whole property. First impressions, the tropical landscaping is exquisite.  It starts with a bridge from the parking lot to an "island" with gas grills and loungers overlooking a decorative waterfall, all of which connects to a pretty big kidney shaped pool.  In the pool area there is also a Jacuzzi.  Lavish tropical foliage everywhere.   There are also tennis courts on the property. In the lobby area there is complementary coffee available, a small fitness center and an office that is open from morning to pretty late (10:00 PM).  I also noticed a small conference room. The building has 16 floors, so there are two elevators.  When you reach your floor you will feel you are in a hotel hallway, no…

title: Right on the beach, good location
review: Dear ml13204, Thank you very much for spending time with us and touring our property. At Pointe Estero Beach Resort we try to make our guests feel as if they are at their home away from home. The fully stocked in-room kitchens and large living rooms give our guests a place to relax and settle into the beach lifestyle. Our resort does sit on the widest stretch of sand on Fort Myers Beach, this gives people plenty of room for activities like catch, Volleyball, frisbee and relaxing. The distance from the property to the water isn't a quarter mile, it's a little less than 100 yards of soft white sand. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Repeat Stay - When You Find What You Like Why Keep Looking?
review: We had a one bedroom unit on the first floor looking out to the beach. It had a full kitchen, 2 baths, great three part screened balcony, laundry. The room was spacious and 95% up to my cleaning standards when we arrived. I wish we had opted for the extra cost of daily housekeeping though as no vacuum or cleaning supplies were in the condo.  The pool and convenience to the big beautiful beach were great. This end of the island is nice and quiet but only a bike ride down the road to the busy active end. About a 20 min drive to shopping if you need a break from the sun and there are restaurants within walking distance. BBQs are available near the pool if you want to grill your dinner-no charge and beach chairs and toys for your use as well. The staff was helpful and friendly all…

title: Great location, great value, great time
review: Dear Monique62, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm pleased to hear you had a good experience and found your room to be spacious and full of extras. Pointe Estero is famous for its large balconies and wide stretch of sand, I'm happy that you enjoyed the stunning views. Yes, we are located on the quiet side of Fort Myers Beach, but only a short drive or bike ride to all the fun on the north end. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Beautiful beaches, magnificent sunsets and comfy accomodations
review: We stayed (3rd time at Pointe Estero) in a 2 bed condo on the 7th floor; this was the same room we stayed in back in Feb-13.  No surprises here...it felt as if we never left.  We absolutely enjoy staying at Pointe Estero with the staff that is always smiling, quick with a "how are you?", and an overall attitude of friendliness.  Great views, excellent pool area, and a sandy beach that just invites your toes to "take a walk".

title: Great find!
review: Point Estero is well located, clean, and beautifully landscaped. Close to Santini Plaza and several restaurants. Staff at the resort are very polite, courteous, and most helpful. Good coffee served every morning after 8:15 is a plus.  The beach behind the resort is huge, and the sand is level so very easy to walk on. There is a heated pool, tennis court, and  a small clubhouse on the side of the resort. Each condo unit is fully equipped which makes family stays a breeze.  Numerous balcony exits  in each unit provide fresh air and great views of the gulf. Our stay at the resort was wonderful. I would highly recommend Point Estero to everyone who wants a relaxing vacation.

title: Better than expected
review: Dear 1PickyTraveller, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear our staff took great care of you, we strive to give each guest a special experience. It sounds like you had a fantastic Fort Myers Beach vacation and I'm happy we could be a part of your experience. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Fantastic holiday
review: Our first but not last time to this resort.  Very friendly staff, beautiful, clean, spacious room with a wonderful view of the ocean, sunset and all.  Big pool, the water was the perfect temperature! Did I mention they have coffee in the lobby for you every morning? My husband and I had such a nice relaxing time taking walks on the beach every day and watching the pelicans, sandpipers and even some dolphins.  The location is perfect, don't need to even rent a car because there are plenty of places you can walk to or take the trolley.  I want to go back already!

title: super clean.. awesome beach!!
review: Dear Shannonmarie519, Thank you so very much for choosing to stay with us during your Fort Myers Beach vacation. I'm pleased to here you had a great time and that our staff was able to take good care of you. We truly do strive to give each guest a special experience. Thank you again and we are looking forward to having you back!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Nice hotel
review: The location of this hotel is amazing! I'm so pleased we chose to stay here for our recent visit to Florida. The accommodation is spacious and the views from the beach front rooms are simply stunning. We left feeling very relaxed, after watching so many sunsets, sun rises and sleeping with the balcony door open listening to the Gulf of Mexico which was pure bliss. The staff are all lovely, very happy and willing to help a real credit to the place:)  The rooms could stand to be updated as the furnishing is very 80's/90's.  The hotel is very well looked after,nice pool area along with a tennis court with decent balls/rackets at no charge.  We would definitely return.

title: Wonderful beach front condo
review: Condo was spacious, clean and had everything you would need to dine in including use of nice BBQ's close to the pool area. Beautiful view of the sunsets from the lanai. Staff were very friendly and helpful, a special thank you to Melissa who answered all our questions in the kindest  way. We hope to be back again someday!

title: Pointe Estero is AWSOME!
review: Dear Itsallgoodsouth, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and found your suite to have everything you needed to prepare a full meal. Our Fort Myers Beach sunsets are famous, I'm glad you were able to enjoy them from your lanai. I will be sure to pass along your kind words to Melissa and the rest of our staff, we truly do strive to make sure each guest has a special experience. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Best pool on FMB
review: Love this place!  Have been visiting for several years!  The place is always spotless, great pool and hot tub.  Plus the rooms are very spacious with a beach Caribbean theme.  The bat tub in the room is bigger than my whole bathroom!!  The place is just awesome!

title: Big tub no shower
review: Dear KevinDJ1, Thank you very much for staying with us throughout the years! Nothing makes us happier than giving our guests a fantastic experience time after time. I'm glad you enjoyed the pool, hot tub, and our large spacious suites, our goal is to make you feel complete comfortable and relaxed. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Good Option
review: We've stayed at several different condos on the island and Pointe Estero has by far the best pool. A nice sized pool with plenty of chairs for laying in the sun or sitting in the shade at the far end of the pool. The pool itself has all day sun exposure. The units are very spacious and comfortable with a great lanai to enjoy a great view of the beach and beautiful sunsets.  Pointe Estero is family friendly as well as a nice get away for couples.

title: Trip to Relax, and WOW, How Nice!!!!!
review: I've been here once, briefly, about a year ago. It was a business trip with a group of people, so the schedule was very busy and hectic, with little relaxing time. Still, I had noticed how nice the room was, and I did get to enjoy the nice pool (that is salt water treated instead of treated with a huge amount of harsh chemicals that burn the eyes, dry out hair and bleach swimsuits, so thank you for using a friendlier form of water treatment Pointe Estero!). I decided I'd definitely want to come back for an actual vacation, and that's what I finally got to do this stay!  I requested a higher floor, for the view, and was put on floor 7. Mental note to myself; also request south side of the building. My initial stay was on the very top floor, on the south unit, and the view was…

title: A Home Away from Home
review: Dear SireniaSolaris, Thank you very much for staying with us again, and this time for relaxation instead of business. We just wish you could have stayed longer! I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your large room with stunning Gulf view. It sounds like you had a very relaxing time and I'm glad to hear you took advantage of the in-room Jacuzzi and our saltwater pool. Nothing makes us happier than giving our guests a fantastic experience. Thank you again for staying with us and we are looking forward to having you back for a longer stay next time.   Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: BEST RESORT ON THE ISLAND
review: My best friend and I came down to Fort Myers beach to celebrate 20 years of friendship together. We checked in and were greeted by Oleg, who was friendly and happy to take care of us. Our room was on the sixth floor (room 601) and we had a lovely view of the Atlantic and the resort pool below.   The accommodations were lovely, including a sleeper sofa, large bed and double sinks in the master bathroom. I did not have a chance to try out the huge, jetted garden tub, but I have a feeling it's amazing. There was also a nice dining area, desk and flat-screen television. Patio access was available from both the living room and bedroom.  The resort boasts a pool, jacuzzi, picnic/barbecue areas and immediate access to the beach. We traveled during one of the rainiest seasons Fort Myers…

title: Great resort!
review: Dear WonderWoman1975, Thank you very much for choosing to stay at Pointe Estero Beach Resort! It sounds like you and your friend had a fantastic time on Fort Myers Beach and the surrounding areas. I'm glad you found your room to be spacious and comfortable, and that you enjoyed your 6th floor view of the Gulf. Nothing makes us happier than hearing that we were able to be a part of a great vacation experience! Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Smiling but note being honest with our money and we got bit by god knows what
review: From the moment we checked in to the moment we checked out, everything was beyond perfect. Our 2 bedroom condo on the 14th floor was extremely clean.  It was very comfortable and roomy.  The kitchen very updated, refrig was huge, ice maker worked wonderful.  No musty odors.  Views from every window.  Bed was very comfy.  Carpet cleaned. Didn't feel like youhad to wear slippers to walk around.  What impressed both myself and husband was the staff went out of their way to provide you anything you needed.  Always greeted with a wave and smile.  Beach was well kept.  No trash, cigarette butts.  Pool area very clean.  Plenty of lounge chairs.  Great BBQ area with new grills.  Always felt safe.  The owners really do take pride in their business and it shows.  Can't wait to return next…

title: Excellent choice for quiet relaxing get-a-away!
review: Stayed here for a weekend getaway.  We rented a two bedroom gulf view room and it was spectacular. The rooms were spacious and clean. The kitchen had everything you could ever need utensil-wise. The views from both bedrooms and the living room were incredible. The staff were all really friendly. What made this a great place was its location.  It is situated on the south end of the beach, away from the touristy crowds. I liked that a lot. The beach was right out the back of the hotel. We rented chairs and an umbrella ($20 all day)that was nice. If you are looking for an excellent clean place to stay this is it. The girl at front desk who checked us in was so pleasant and suggested some restaurants. This place is a gem!

title: Girls weekend
review: Dear Lori024, Thank you very much for staying with us! I'm happy to hear that you loved your two bedroom suite with views of the Gulf, nothing beats waking up to a view of the sand and surf. I'm also glad to hear that our staff took great care of you. We strive to give each guest a special experience and I'm glad we could do that for you. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Last minute get a way
review: Recently the "Golden Girls" from Lake Placid, Fl. went to Pointe Estero for a weekend getaway. The apartment was beautiful, the view was breath taking, and the staff were awesome!  We could not have chosen a better place to stay, thank you for the hospitality.

title: POOL and BEACH great views from room
review: Dear Cookie K, Thank you for staying with us, it was our complete pleasure to host the "Golden Girls" for a weekend getaway! I'm happy to hear that our staff was able to take great care of you and that the view of the Gulf was everything you were looking for. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Excellent Beach Front Condo Resort!!
review: I wanted time to myself, and my first thought was a return visit to Pointe Estero. I recently had back surgery. so I knew I would not be able to enjoy the beach, but the swimming pool did the trick. It looked as if all the tropical plants had been replaced since my last visit. Everything was lush and green, and the pool was just what the doctor ordered.

title: Excellent Plac3
review: Very clean and friendly service. Rooms are very comfortable and clean.I recommend this hotel being that the service and the rooms are so great. Check in and Check out was a breeze. The beach is white sandy and warm. The pool had a great temperature. There are BBQ all over by the pool area and the rooms have everything you ca think of to prepare a great meal.

title: Feel of a rental home,  convenience of a hotel
review: Dear Center63, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. We do pride ourselves on our award-winning service and our rooms are second to none on Fort Myers Beach. I'm happy to hear you had a wonderful experience and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Beautiful
review: Had a great time here.  We stayed in one of the side units on the 5th floor.  The screened in porch was amazing. It was all connected and perfectly situated to see a beautiful sunset.  The master tub was ridiculous, the kids used it as a hot tub/ kiddie pool in the rainy parts of the day. The unit was very clean and all the furniture was very comfy. The beds had extra pillows which is really important to us. They had very nice gas grills in the public area...newer webers very big and nice... 4 of them I think. We never used them, but they looked great.   Walk to beach is easy and beach towels are provided. We rented beach chairs for $20 a day.  If you have small kids, go to the beach at 8am... since they wake at 6 am anyway. By 10 they are ready to hit the pool for an hour till…

title: gorgeous condo
review: Dear Chrissi S, Thank you very much for staying with us! I'm excited to hear that you and your family had a great time and enjoyed the beach and pool. We try to make our guests feel as if they are at their home away from home when staying with us, I'm glad we could do that for you. Thank you again and we hope to see you in the future!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Fantastic Condo
review: Second time at the pointe estero, we loved it! Right on the beach, nice pool, helpful staff, grills, all the comforts of home but on the beach! Not far from the supermarket or times square, or great restaurants.

title: Gerald M
review: We have stayed at Pointe Estero many times over the years and have enjoyed every stay. The units have all have balcony s from the living room the master bedroom and the guest room all over looking the beach. Pointe Estero is at the South end of Estero Island so there is a lot less traffic and the beach isn't crowded and yet there is a strip mall with good food within  walking distance and a movie theater a short drive away.

title: Beach weekend get-a-way
review: Dear Gerald M, Thank you very much for staying with us over the years. I'm happy to hear you had another great experience at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. Yes, we also think our location on the south end of the island is a great asset. It's quiet, has great restaurants and it's easy to get to the north end if you need to. Plus we are on the widest stretch of sand on the beach! Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Excellent!
review: You can imagine my surprise upon check-in when told we were upgraded at no additional cost.  It's only scratched the surface of the fabulous weekend we had.  Our room and our friends room (different angel) both had a panoramic view of the water.  If you sat in a chair not facing a window or sliding glass door, there was a mirror strategically placed so every seat had an awesome view!  Attention to detail is magnificent in this resort.  You won't regret it.

title: Fantastic
review: Dear Marcia A, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your upgraded room and the wonderful views of the Gulf of Mexico. Attention to detail and exceeding our guest's expectation is what we love to do. We strive to give each guest a memorable experience. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Amazing resort perfect for our family
review: We love this place! We've stayed there the last two years, and it's been perfect both times. It's super clean, the employees are polite and helpful, and the view from the balcony is awesome. The rooms have everything you need, and it's like a home away from home. So comfy and relaxing! We love, love, LOVE this place. We can't wait to go back!

title: Great beach resort!
review: We booked two rooms for three families and couldn't have been happier with the results. The rooms were spacious and well appointed, and the accommodating staff made sure we were on the same floor. The beach is the widest expanse on the island - so it's a bit of a walk if you have a lot of stuff to take with you. Great grilling area and hot tub, and a decent-sized pool. Plenty of ice in the ice machine on the ground floor, making it easy to take a cooler to the beach. We only had two issues the entire week we stayed there - the pool had to be closed one day, but they allowed us to use the pool next door; and there were problems with the elevators - we were actually stuck for about 20 minutes in our last night. With that said - the staff was excellent and did what they could to…

title: Perfect holiday condo with a sea view
review: Dear BBurne1003, Thank you very much for staying with us on Fort Myers Beach. I'm happy to hear you and the other members of your party enjoyed your large suite style rooms and our location on the beach. We truly do strive to give each guest a fantastic Fort Myers Beach vacation experience. Thank you again and we hope to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Return visit just as good
review: Super friendly staff, excellent condo with great view. Good pool and right on the beach. Close to food store. Complementary morning coffee at the reception desk. We will be back! Stayed 6 nights. We were able to check in early and checkout late,

title: fantastic place fantastic location
review: Dear Susanne G, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed the property and that our staff was able to take good care of you. We truly do strive to give each guest a memorable experience. Thank you again and we are looking forward to see you back in the future!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Terrific stay!
review: How many times do you go back go a place and its not as good as the first time?  Not so here!  I stayed here two years ago and had a wonderful relaxing vacation. Repeat this time!  The rooms and property are well thought out. Very comfortable, very relaxing. Staff is friendly and location superb.

title: excellent stay!!
review: We had an amazing stay @ Pointe Estero Beach Resort. Excellent condo with amazing views! great amenities .  The staff extremely friendly! Me, my husband and my two kids had an amazing time.. extremely relaxing en enjoyable.  Would absolutely come back!!!  :)

title: Absolutely wonderful vacation resort! Can't wait to return!
review: Dear Maca680, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear that you had a great time and that our staff was able to take such good care of you. We strive to give each guest a memorable experience and I'm glad we could do that for you. Please come back and see us again soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Ft Myers/Estero Beach
review: We had an awesome experience at Pointe Estero! The condos were spacious, well equipped, and had an amazing wrap around balcony! The staff was extremely friendly! The expansive beach offered the most beautiful sunsets!

title: Wish it were quieter, but still a nice trip.
review: Dear Rotherjo, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your large condo style suite and the world famous Fort Myers Beach sunsets. I will pass along your kind words to our staff as I know they will appreciate it. We truly do strive to give each guest a special experience and I'm glad we could provide that for you. Thank you again, please come back and see us soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Great experience!
review: Stayed at Point Estero for 4 days. Great 2bedroom condo, beautiful resort, fabulous beach. Would definitely recommend and if you need a 3 bedroom the Gullwing next resort over is sister resort same great ammenities, staff and local. Just a few minutes from the party spots so you get the quiet or the night life. Santini Plaza about two blocks south has great restaurants and shops. Also, love the bar/restaurant at the Holiday Inn just two building south on the beach.

title: Awesome!
review: We stayed here for a few nights to "get away" from the crowds and it was excellent!  This is actually a condo building, not a hotel and it was fully equipped for a great short-term or long-term stay.  The views are breathtaking....Sunset off the balcony and sunrise from the windows of the master bath hot tub!.  The beach was very laid back and clean.  The pool area and Jacuzzi are both clean and beautiful.  There is a nice waterfall, tennis courts and a few scenic bridges over the small pond.  There are also a few grills there that are big and in good shape.  You can eat outside or bring it back up to your condo.    The Publix is a short distance away and the trolley stops at the end of the drive-way.  We stayed in a two bed/two bath unit.  We paid for a one bed, so the…

title: Excellent Getaway
review: Dear Gators99, Thank you very much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm thrilled to hear you had a fantastic time and enjoyed your Gulf views and the quiet side of Fort Myers Beach. Guest happiness is our number one priority and I'm glad we could give you a great vacation. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Amazing vacation
review: 4 rooms, 8 couples weekend getaway.  Great facilities, clean and new.  Will definitely return. Very kid friendly, nice BBQ grilling facilities and of course gulf beach enjoyment.  Also, you don't need to go far to get anything you need.  The area counts with excellent grocery stores, restaurants and whatever else you might need.

title: Great all around hotel
review: Dear Vmonserrate, Thank you so much for staying with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm very happy that you and your family had a great time. Guest happiness is our number one priority and I'm glad we could give you a great vacation. Please come back and see us soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Relaxing and away from the crowds
review: Beautiful scenery , amazing and relaxing beach town. Resort is located right on the beach with some of the rooms facing the beautiful gulf beach. Our condo had a fantastic balcony facing the beach, one king size bedroom and one room with two twin beds. The master bedroom with a great bathroom including jacuzzi, other bathroom with access to the second room with washer and dryer. Nice size living room and dining room. Fully equipped kitchen with the latest appliances. The staff very professional and courteous . Very close to area amenities, bars ,restaurants and shopping. A lot of to do things like fishing , boat and kayak rentals or just pure relaxation. My new favorite vacation spot.

title: Second time here!
review: Just had another awesome time. This was our 2nd time staying at Pointe Estero and looking forward to our next trip here.  Our room has always been great with views the staff is all so nice. With Tropical Storm Andrea visiting the same we were our time was still great.  Melissa at the front desk had places printed off to go and do with kids.  What a wonderful place to stay knowing they care about you.

title: Loved this place
review: Dear Larry L, Thank you very much for staying with us again. I'm so happy you and your family had a great time, even with the bad weather. I'm glad our staff was able to take such good care of you, we strive to make sure each guest has a special experience. Please come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Awesome place to stay.
review: This was our first time at Point Estero and it was great. Having 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms was perfect for our group. The property is very clean, the staff is very attentive and helpful, and the beach is the best! The Fort Myers Beach area is also a fun place for eating, shopping, and people watching. If you're looking for some fun in the sun and a great place to stay, Point Estero fits the bill perfectly!

title: Beautiful Views
review: Dear kpk1339, Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us. I'm glad we could make your first experience with us one to remember. Our staff's number one priority is guest happiness, we strive to make sure each guest has a special experience. I'm happy that you enjoyed your large 2 bedroom suite and took advantage of all the great things Fort Myers Beach has to offer. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Wonderful beach spot
review: Point Estero is located on the beautiful wide stretch of white sand beach. The location is just perfect. The room was large, very clean, well appointed and comfortable. The view from the lanai was gorgeous. I can't wait to go back.

title: Trying to figure out how together back there!
review: Perfect for a family of 5. Plenty of room/ privacy for everyone. We did not choose an ocean front unit and the views of the ocean, as well as the bay were amazing. Having a washer and dryer was very helpful. We used the very clean well maintained grills one night, but there were plenty of places to eat in walking distant. Huge tub in the master bedroom. One tip: request a higher floor.

title: Hidden gem for nice stayvon beach
review: Dear Shan319, Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your review. I'm glad to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay and were able to take advantage of the patio grills. Guests love to grill up delicious food right on the beach and enjoy the scenery. Again, thank you very much for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you in the future!  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: This place is amazing
review: Staff are very helpful. Rooms are spacious and updated. We had beautiful view and the hotel was pretty quiet even on a memorial day weekend with many guests. Pool closes a little early and wished they had an adult section. That's about my only complaint but very minor. Pool also was tad bit dirty a couple of times during our stay but not enough to highly recommend staying. Price was very good for everything provided.

title: Excellent stay
review: Dear Perm_Vaca_Joe, Thank you for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I'm happy to hear you had a great time and that our staff were able to serve you well. We strive to make sure every guest has a special experience during their stay. Thank you for letting me know about the pool. We hope to see you again in the future.  Sincerely, Randy Kares - General Manager

title: Another Great Vacation at Pointe Estero
review: Can't say enough about this place and the staff.  After a long commute with flying and 2 and a half hour drive from the airport with a 3 year old we were looking forward to just getting to this place to relax.  I was pleasantly surprised to find out they had given us an upgrade to the penthouse suite, very nice way to start our vacation.  The place had phenomenal views and all we could do was smile the entire week.  The staff goes above and beyond to ensure your stay is excellent.  I love to BBQ and to be able to BBQ on brand new Weber's was a sweet plus.  The beach is amazing with white sand going on for miles and miles.  I had not been to Florida for about 15 years but going to Pointe Estero has changed my mind about ensuring I return in the very near future.  Thanks staff at…

title: The views are outstanding, especially from the upper floors
review: The living room of my 15th floor looked out over the wide, white sand beach while osprey, pelicans, and even frigate birds flew nearby.  The gulf was a mosaic of colors as the clouds passed overhead.  From the dining room and master bath, the canals and back bay were visible.  Few places allow you to see both sunrise and sunset!  The angled balcony had a lot of space for the table and chairs.  Also the outside hallway window opened about 4 inches allowing one to shoot pictures of the back bay clearly.  The units are spacious and clean but the furniture and faucets could use some updating.  They do have washer/dryer combos I only used the kitchen once but could not get hot water.  The unit has pool towels, and the pool and grill areas are very pleasant with a small waterfall and…

title: Awesome!!!!!!!!
review: Dear das007ta, Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your review. We appreciate your feedback. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that the views of the Gulf and Bay were able to take your breath away! Guest happiness is our number one priority. Thank you for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort and we hope to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely, Randy Kares General Manager

title: As it seems to be
review: My family stayed there for a night And it was so beautiful and relaxing. Beach was beautiful with white sand, not crowed and you can rent chairs and umbrella for$20 a day. The condo was awesome with screened porch , jacuzzi tub in master room, would love to go back someday

title: Sophisticat
review: Dear Michele L, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Resort. I'm happy to hear you had a fantastic time and enjoyed your large porch, jacuzzi tub and the big beautiful beach. Thank you for taking the time to give us your review and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Randy Kares General Manager

title: Wonderfule
review: Rarely have I stayed at a hotel that met all my expectations 100%.  Pointe Estero did.  I found the property by using Google Maps and going down the beach looking for a hotel.  I read the reviews on Trip Advisor and decided to take a chance.  Good choice!  Spotless property.  Staff courteous, friendly, attentive.  We were made to feel welcome and not a chore.  The room was impeccable.  FULL kitchen with everything you'd have at home.  Very clean, comfortable furnishings.  Wraparound balcony with full view of the ocean. Cabanas for rent on the beach for a VERY reasonable rate that can be charged to your room.  Beach towels provided in your room.  Beautiful outdoor pool & Jacuzzi kept in pristine condition.  Would go again and again.

title: Wow!
review: My family has stated at Gullwing the last couple of years we've been in Fort Myers Beach. But this year we decided to check out Pointe Estero. They are both owned by Sunstream. I didn't think I could love anything more than Gullwing. But Pointe Estero was AMAZING! Both rooms had their own balcony. The balcony gave you a great view of not only the ocean but the coast line too!! One morning we even saw dolphins playing in the water right next to the beach. The master bedroom also had a huge whirlpool which was pretty cool. It took a while to fill it up but it was great after a long day at the beach. The staff was great. We also met some really wonderful people from Indiana in the hot tub. Everyone is so friendly and I would highly recommend Pointe Estero to anyone looking for a…

title: Great Family Vacation Resort
review: Dear Minnesotagirl72, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort and for taking the time to give us your feedback. Your kind words are an inspiration and I will be sharing them with our staff. We truly do strive to give each guest a fantastic experience. We are thrilled you got to see a few of our friendly dolphins and enjoyed beautiful Fort Myers Beach. We look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely, Randy Kares General Manager

title: Pleasantly surprised
review: For the last 4 years my daughters and their families have joined my husband and I at this wonderful resort.  We each get our own condos and have a great time.  The beach is lovely (although a far walk from the resort) and the pool is very nice.  We love having washers and dryers in each unit (means we don't have to over pack!).  I highly recommend this resort!

title: BEST VACATION EVER!!!
review: Dear 231KarenH, Thank you very much for making Pointe Estero Beach Resort your choice for a Fort Myers Beach vacation. We appreciate your positive feedback! We love to hear that our guests had a fantastic experience with us. Glad you enjoyed the in-room washer and dryer as well! Thank you again and we look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely, Randy Kares General Manager

title: Fantastic Condo
review: We just returned from our last child's spring break vacation from Ponte Estero Beach Resort. We had never been to Ft. Myers Beach let alone this resort. So we were flying blind. We wanted to have a great experience for our son and his friend as they are graduating fromm high school this year. From the moment we pulled up we knew we had picked the right place. The receptionist at the desk was so kind and helpful. And when we walked into our unit we were again surprised with the quality of this resort. It is the perfect location away from all of the traffic and craziness of spring breakers but close enough to go to it if you so choose. There are a great number of of good eateries within walking distance, as there are opportunities to rent boats to go boating on the intercoastal.…

title: "Great short stay"
review: We took a chance on short notice to call Point Estero for a short weekend stay.  As SW Florida residents, we have enjoyed staying at this property several times.  The staff are friendly and accomodating, and the rooms are spacious and clean.  You do need a car if you want to stock up on food and supplies.  I agree with other reviewers that the views are better on the higher floors.  The wrap around balconies are amazing.  We grilled out for dinner and met some friendly travelers who were enjoying their stay as well.  Pointe Estero never disappoints.

title: Perfect for a trip to the Beach
review: Dear GAGirl07, Thank you for taking the time to leave your comment on Pointe Estero Resort. We are thrilled you had a great stay and enjoyed the wrap around balconies. Our staff takes great pride in their work and they are always striving to give our guests a memorable stay. Thanks again and we hope to serve you again in the future!  Sincerely, Randy Kares General Manager

title: Just great!
review: My family recently took up several rooms for a wedding weekend at Pointe Estero Resort in October. We took advantage of a SniqueAway sale and had a fantastic rate. Everyone had one of the two-bedroom apartments.   Pointe Estero was exactly what we were looking for given our needs for the weekend. This is definitely not a resort with many full-service amenities. If you are looking for a resort experience, I recommend you look elsewhere. If you prefer to be on your own as if you're coming back to your own place, Pointe Estero is for you.   The resort is right on the beach and there's plenty of it! A fars stretch to the ocean. There's also a pool that is a decent size.   The apartments are very spacious, we were able to have about 15 -20 people in the apartment for a family…

title: Dream Location
review: Dear Guilianova84, Thank your for taking the time to review Pointe Estero Resort. We are so happy you loved your experience and the size of the rooms. We appreciate the feedback and use it to improve our property and services. Thanks again and we look forward to serving you in the future! Sincerely, Randy Kares General Manager

title: Beautiful beach. great location and nice condo layout
review: Pointe Estero Beach Resort is in a perfect location.  Ft. Meyers Airport is less than an hour away.  There is easy access to and from the south end of the island, and there are a number of nice shops, restaurants and other amenities within a short walking distance.

title: Excellent!
review: Stayed in Penthouse suite for 6 days, 16/2-23/2 2013 It was excellent, lived up to all expectations. Marvelous view and the hotel is right on the beach. We (2 adults 2 children) had a fantastic time and can absolute recommend Pointe Estero Beach Resort. Cant say anything bad about it. Best Regards Ragnar Thore, Sweden.

title: Awesome stay on the beach
review: Dear Sofie T,  Thank you for taking the time to review and comment on your stay with Pointe Estero Beach Resort.  I am pleased to hear about your long stay with us and that we met your expectations.  We hope to serve you and your family again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares General Manager, Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: fantasic place to stay
review: Just returned from an awesome get away with my husband. Pointe Estero is very quiet compared to other places we have stayed on the beach. I'm thinking it is just built better since it is a tad older. We never heard any of our neighbors our entire stay. The beds are amazing! We have a sleep number at home and have never slept well away from home, but this place was didn't skimp when it came to the mattress. The living room furniture was a bit dated, but we really spent very little time there.  They don't come and clean each day unless you pay extra, but we find that often.  Loved having a washer and dryer in the unit :) You can't see the ocean from the pool, but, when it's windy or a tad cooler that is a plus.

title: Nice place to stay
review: Dear nanner40,  Thank you for taking the time to review and comment on your stay with Pointe Estero Beach Resort.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed the rooms and found the mattress to your standard.  We look forward to serving you in the future.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares General Manager, Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: Favorite Vacation Stay
review: We highly recommend this hotel.  We were there for 5 nights and it was everything we were looking for.  Great staff and the room was great with stunning views of the gulf.  We were not dissapointed with anything.  The 2 bedroom was very clean and spacious for 5 of us.  We would love to return to Pointe Estero if we come back to Ft Myers again.  THis will be the first place we would choose.

title: Nice location, comfortable condo
review: We were upgarded to the penthouse, which was very comfortable and had plenty of room.  It would have been a great spot for a party - the loft opens up to the rooftop deck, which is huge.  Very roomy and very comfortable.  Condo was clean although getting a little bit dated in the decor.

title: Overall Good Experience
review: Dear cuberican,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your time at Pointe Estero. I am delighted you enjoyed the accommodations in the penthouse. . Our staff takes great pride in their work and, they are always striving to serve our guests with the highest level of customer service and products available. Thanks again for your feedback. We hope to serve you again in the future.   Sincerely,  Randy Kares General Manager, Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: Place to relax and unwind!!
review: For my daughter's wedding in Fort Myers, we decided to stay at the beach (her wedding was downtown at the historic Burroughs Home) and encouraged family and friends to stay near our hotel so we could host pre- and post-wedding festivities. A condo hotel seemed like a good idea so we could have full kitchen and living space access without having to rent a "party room."   When we checked into the Pointe Estero Beach Resort (PEBR) we didn't exactly have high hopes for a pleasant stay. The young man at the front desk couldn't get rid of us fast enough, and we were given a room on the first floor, which was fine - until we got to the room. The lanai was totally unusable - it was surrounded by EVERY air conditioning unit for the complex! And with temps in the 80's, the noise level was…

title: Beautiful Vacation Site
review: Dear RobinQuiversFan,  We appreciate your feedback regarding our hotel facilities. I am sorry to learn of your disappointments during your visit at our hotel. I assure you that each guest’s comfort is a very important aspect of our success and I will take your comments back to our team members so that we may discuss the opportunities available to each of us to improve the guest experience. I hope you will allow us another opportunity to serve you when you return to the area.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares General Manager, Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: Can't beat the view!!
review: This is our first time here at this resort which we found via Traveladvisor's Sniqueaway website.  Our unit is a 2 bedroom beach front view unit.  The room layout was great where the two bedrooms were on opposite ends of the unit, master bedroom having a huge whirlpool tub with shower. Kitchen stocked with modern fridge, range, dishwasher and all the essentials, full size glass dining room table, and the gorgeous patio that went all around the perimeter of the unit.  The sliding doors out to the patio was solid keeping any outside noise outside and quiet inside once closed.  Washer and drier was plus for doing the towels.  There was fresh coffee available downstairs near the elevator in the morning for guest and loved the convenience of shopping carts to carry the groceries up…

title: Hidden Gem
review: Only our second trip to the "West Coast", and we were shocked on how nice it was.  The Pointe Estero was the perfect call for my wife, daughter and I.  Clean and spacious rooms (condo really), the staff could not have been nicer. Do to Winter Storm Nemo (I can't believe we are now naming winter storms!), we had to cut our trip short by a day, and the front desk allowed us to leave a day early.   Stayed on the second floor, and while some reviews mentioned that the higher up you are, the better, our view was spectacular.  The "people of the West Coast" have the most incredible sunsets every evening... didn't hurt that we did not see a cloud in the three days that we were there.  Rented chairs and umbrellas on the beach; rented ski-doos one afternoon; took a "Dolphin & Manatee"…

title: Great Place To Stay
review: Dear Kellysig,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are so glad you enjoyed your accommodations and our location as well as our beautiful sunsets. We hope to have to opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares General Manager, Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: Wonderful property
review: We stayed at Pointe Estero for five nights and had a wonderful time.  We stayed on the 12th floor and had a wonderful view of the Gulf.  The whole place was clean and the staff were very friendly.  The room was great for our family of 4.  We especially loved the living room area and the full kitchen.  We went to the grocery store our first day there and bought items for almost all our meals.  The kitchen was very well stocked.  We also liked having the washer and dryer.  The beach was very clean.  We went for a walk every morning and saw lots of sea life and shells along the shore.  If you go at just the right time, you might even see the dolphins eating their breakfast!

title: GREAT TRIP
review: Dear gidge89,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. We are so glad you enjoyed your accommodations and your gulf view and beach location. We hope to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Randy Kares General Manager, Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: A Super Place to Stay
review: We stayed in a beach front condo.  What a gorgeous view!  It is located on a beautiful stretch of beach.  The condo was very clean and nicely decorated.  The staff were very friendly and helpful. My husband and I stayed there for three nights and wish we could have stayed longer.  We will definitely stay here again.

title: Christmas at Pointe Estero
review: This resort offers a variety of things to do with shopping and restaurants nearby. The bonus is the wonderful beach and pool.  Our family spent Christmas this year at Pointe Estero and it was an excellent choice.  The units offer a dining room  big enough for families to dine  plus a very nice kitchen.  We all loved the resort.  Hope to return again!

title: Wonderful Visit Over the Holidays
review: Dear bonelle3917, Thank you for commenting on your recent stay at our Pointe Estero Beach Resort property. I am very happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your accommodations as well as local area beach amenities. My staff and I are happy to receive feedback from our guests and we truly look forward to seeing you and your family upon your return to Fort Myers Beach in near future.  Sincerely, Randy Kares, General Manager Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: VERY CLEAN! Would stay again in a heart beat
review: Has previously stayed next door at the Gull Wing (also a Sunstream resort) and had good experiences. Arrived before check-in and although the room was not ready the staff was very accomodating and assisted us in storing our luggage while we roamed the beach. They notified us immediately when the room was ready (an hour before the true check in time). The room was spotless and well maintained. A little older decor and the carpeting will need to be replaced in a while but certainly not worn out. Beautiful views and enough space for all of us (2 parents and 3 daughters). We had a unit on an upper floor and loved the views of sunsets. We had one problem - too much fighting over who would get to use the in-room jacuzzi!! It's huge but located in the Master bedroom so keeping our kids…

title: fantastic vacation spot
review: We just got back from our week long stay at the Pointe Estero. My husband has stayed a couple times at their sister-resort, the Gull Wing, just next door.  He said the Pointe seemed nicer, cleaner, and more up-to date (although both are great).  We are a younger couple, 23 and 25, married with a 15mo old girl.  We are kind of germ-freaks, so cleanliness is top priority for us.  When checking in, I wasn't impressed. There just isn't much of a lobby, but who cares? I kept my hopes up...we got to our room, which was on the 11th floor.  We only paid for a one bedroom, gulf view suite, and we walked into a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom with a great view!  Full kitchen with very clean, barely used dishes (though we hand washed em prior to using em anyway).  Only complaint were the dull…

title: Just Fabulous
review: Dear Rachel_2p, Thank you for commenting on your recent stay at our Pointe Estero Beach Resort property. I am very happy to hear that you and your family were more than satisfied with your 2-bedroom accommodations and the room's amenities. My staff and I work diligently to provide the very best products and high level of customer service to all our guests, I will be sharing your kind feedback with our staff and management team. We greatly appreciate your comments and truly look forward to serving you and your family again in the very near future.  Sincerely, Randy Kares, General Manager Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: I would give these guys six stars after our experience
review: We probably had the best vacation experience of our life in a Pointe Estero condo last month.  Having stayed there before, we knew the place was nice and well-run, which led to our decision to stay again.  I asked for a room as high as possible, and upon arrival, we were offered a penthouse due to some construction going on in lower floors.  Fabulous in all respects!  My wife was beside herself with glee, and wasted no time checking out all the amenities and view.  What a memorable six days at Pointe Estero.  I'd like to thank Chelsea and Darla and everyone we had contact with and made this occasion possible.  It was truly a "once-in-a-lifetime" experience.

title: It was nice and I would stay again.
review: Dear Senior2004,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay with us at our Pointe Estero Beach Resort property. We are greatly appreciative of all your kind comments regarding your penthouse suite accommodations and the level of customer service you received, especially by our staff members, Chelsea and Darla, who we will be sharing your comments with directly as well as with our management staff and team. I am thrilled to know that you were more than satisfied with your stay and we truly look forward to another opportunity to serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Rick Newman, General Manager Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: Thanksgiving Family Vacation
review: I’m glad I found this place, I did a ton of research and noticed that the hotels are either average or below average for the area.  Point Estero is a little above average and is just out of walking distance to Fort Myers Beach and Lovers Key.  It’s quite with a huge beach, great fishing and shelling right from the shores.  The room was apartment style with a kitchen, huge whirlpool bathtub, and a balcony.  The only downside was that the bed was very uncomfortable it could just be the fact that I am used to my memory foam mattress at home! I do not regret staying here and would stay again.

title: Perfect Spot on Ft.Myers Beach
review: Great location. Never stayed in that location, as always stay at sister hotel next door. Spacious 2 BR condo, had high beachfront and the view and sunset was amazing everyday. Beautiful pool area and grounds. Easy access to the beach and right on the sand to walk to the beach and rent your cabanas or beach umbrella. We had an excellent high floor room, with great view of the Fort Myers Sand Castle event.  All we can say it was a beautiful Family Thanksgiving and incredible days at the beach!

title: Go for the tub in Master bath alone!
review: Dear jcastillo99, Thank you for commenting on your recent stay with us this past Thanksgiving holiday. I am thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed our resort's amenities as well as our beach location and area offerings. I will be sharing your comments with our management team and staff as we always strive to offer all our guest the very best products and services we have available. We look forward to another opportunity to serve you in the near future.  Sincerely, Rick Newman, General Manager Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: Great Place
review: Just returned from another great 10 day stay at Pointe Estero Beach Resort.  First stayed there 20 years ago and have been most years in between (sometimes staying at Gull WIng next door) - and have always had a fantastic time.  The Condo is of the highest quality - very roomy, beautifully decorated and well maintained.  The staff are very helpful and all the late-night check-in arrangements worked very well.  It is located on the best part of Fort Myers Beach with great walks, shelling and swimming.  The pool and deck area, hot tub and grills just add the final touch to what is always a pleasurable experience.  You will find cheaper - but the quality, beach front location, amenities and service justifies the price.

title: Great place
review: Dear UkTraveller65, Thank you for commenting on your recent return stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your condo accommodations and our local beach offerings. My staff and I greatly appreciate your kind feedback on our high level of customer service as we take great pride in offering the very best products and service to all our guests. I thank you again for commenting and we all look forward to serving you again on your next trip to the SW Florida area.  Sincerely, Rick Newman, General Manager Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: Roomy and clean right on the beach
review: Just spent 4 nights here and had a great time.  It was our second stay at this location and this was better as we were on the tenth floor and not the second.  The view is perfect and the accommodations are beautifully decorated and fully stocked.  We enjoyed the heated pool, lounge chairs, hot tub and the gas grills.  If you need internet service be sure to inquire upon arrival and they will lend you a modem.  We didn't find out about that until day 2.  The only drawbacks were the ants in the kitchen and the charge for more dishwasher detergent.  You get one at arrival but you have to pay for extra.  So, bring some with you to avoid the charge.  It is a family friendly place and they provide coffee in the lobby every morning.  There are 3 tiki huts out back with picnic tables…

title: Beach Resort numero uno!
review: Dear 3rdsister, Thank you for commenting on your recent stay with us at Pointe Estero Beach Resort. We appreciate your comments and feedback and are happy to hear you enjoyed your accommodations, our pool and other resort amenities. I wish to apologize regarding the bug issue during your stay, I have alerted our maintenance staff so they can resolve this concern for future guests. We also apologize for any inconvenience regarding your room supplies as we do our best to ensure each room is stocked appropriately. We look forward to hopefully serving you again in the very near future.  Sincerely, Rick Newman, General Manager Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: Getaway Perfection!
review: I only came for business but I would come back again with family.  The condo was very roomy, 2 baths one with a huge jacuzzi.   Staff very helpful, when recommending food or giving directions. They rent umbellas and chairs at the beach .  Window by jacuzzi looked out onto the gulf, as did 2 screened in patios.    The ONLY thing I hated was wading through the 1/2 foot lake type water to get to the ocean..

title: Wonderful stay with friends
review: I stayed at Pointe Estero for a girls weekend with a group of friends.  I loved the rooms, the decor, the location...everything!  The pool area was never overly crowded.  The bath in the master bathroom is HUGE--could easily fit 6 people in there. There is a CVS within walking distance and a Publix just a couple of miles away.  The screened patio was nice with a nice view.  Overall a great stay and I would definitely go back with a group of friends or my own family.

title: Beach beauty
review: Dear Snoozy-Q, Thank you for commenting on your recent stay with us at our Pointe Estero Beach Resort. We are happy to hear you and your friends enjoyed your accommodations and took advantage of our pool and local area offerings.  My staff and I work diligently to ensure all our guests are provided the very best products and services we can offer. We look forward to serving you again in the very near future.  Sincerely, Rick Newman, General Manager Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: STAY HERE for a great family vacation!
review: pointe estero is located right on the beach, large clean rooms,full kitchens even a washer/dryer.The only thing missing is a restarant.great place for a family vacation plenty of room for all the 2 bedroom is close to perfect. I would not mind living here full time.

title: Family Fun
review: If you are planning a trip to Ft. Myers Beach STAY HERE and don’t fall for the hype of the Pink Shell resort.  We just returned from a 4 night stay at the Pointe Estero Beach Resort and I can only say wonderful things about our experience.  Our family, 2 adults and 2 kids (ages 2 and 5) travelled with another family consisting of 3 adults and 4 kids ranging from age 9 months through 14years old. Last year we stayed at the Pink Shell Resort and it was a major disappointment, way overpriced, and terrible customer service.  From the beginning the staff at Pointe Estero was excellent.  They kindly honored our request to have rooms on the same floor.  The rooms were 2 bedroom condos.  They come fully equipped with everything you need to make your stay the perfect home away from home.…

title: Enjoyed our stay at Pointe Estero!
review: Dear TripnTripn,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on our Pointe Estero Beach Resort property regarding your recent stay. We are very happy to hear you and your family (especially your kids) enjoyed your condo and all the amenities we offer our guests who come to stay with us.  We also appreciate your compliments on our service; our dedicated staff and management team take pride in the daily endeavor to offer each and every guest the highest level of customer service possible. It is also very nice to know you took advantage of our local area Publix market for all your family's needs.  We truly look forward to seeing you and your family upon your return to the Fort Myers Beach area.  Sincerely, Rick Newman, General Manager Pointe Estero Beach Resort

title: Very Nice
review: We just returned from an extended weekend at the Estero Beach Resort in Ft. Myers.  The rooms were fantastic, very clean upon arrival and the kids loved the huge jacuzzi tub in the room.    The staff was kind  enough to let us store our luggage as we had arrived early and got into our bathing suits for a quick trip to the pool.  Pool area was nice, could have used a couple more umbrellas but the kids enjoyed it.     The walk to the beach was okay, you had to wade through standing water to get to the gulf and even though the resort is on the beach, it is still a bit of a walk to get to it!  However, there were umbrellas and jet-ski rentals on site.    Thanks to the staff for taking care of us and we look forward to returning soon.

title: Great location
review: Dear GMatBWOrlando,  Thank you for taking the time to review and comment on our Pointe Estero Beach Resort property and guest services. We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed the pool area and beach amenities.  We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay with us, our staff prides itself daily on offering the highest level of customer service and products available and we do hope you afford us another opportunity to serve you in the future.
